We team up with hundreds of international coffee brands to give back real value to the community.Since last April, we have given away more than 400 bags of coffee and brewing tools to the coffee communities around the world.  #coffeemoustacheThis campaign aims to bring a smile to people’s faces and raise awareness of baristas’ mental health issues.  
 We love sharing coffee stories and truly believe that these stories are inspiring baristas all over the world! With this in mind, we also know that a lot of you live busy lives, and sometimes finding the time to sit down and read a story is not that easy. With our podcast, now you can listen to all our coffee stories on the go! You can find us on Spotify, Apple Podcast, and Google Podcast now. Spotify Podcast / Apple Podcast / Google Podcast What does coffee mean to us? Coffee is community. A big shoutout to these amazing Individuals from across the world who has worked on this product. Therefore, each card is representative of much more than just a recipe, it acts as a door leading the reader to a community of like-minded coffee individuals. Interns involved in this projectVirginia Fanticini / Nicole Hilton / Antonio Montoro Diaz / Vicky / Anna Navoychik / Konstantina Votsika /  Lousia Campbell / Emilie Milne / Beste Semiz / Camille Lowe / Benedetta Locatelli Volunteers

Designer: Guadalupe Delgadillo / Naomi Doedelz 


Copy Writing: Tigger Chaturabul / Vasileia Fanarioti / Ronița Dragomir / Anna Suffolk


Accounting: Chui Yan Yau 


Marketing: Tigger Chaturabul  / Zed Wong 


Project Consulting: Andrea Pernicano 


Videographer: Vladimir Vorslov


Barista actors: Nes Suvorova / Roman Zoller 

 Recipe testersSpecial thanks to the following overcaffeinated recipe testers who spent hours testing the recipes and providing valuable feedback to help deliver the final recipes to your hands.Alejandro Cardenas /  Karolina Gaizauskiene / Daniella Gray / Sebastian Franzén /  Renan Dantas / Martijn Vanbuel / Mónica Lezama / Łukasz Gałęcki / Idan Horowitz / Fakhri Wiratama/ Faiz Noor / Martino / Michal Boček / Pravin Yadav / Siew Hui / Andres Randazzo / Guadalupe Delgadillo / Helio Moraes / bilal yıldız / Claudio Chávez / David Graus / Dawid / Eduardo Namura / Gerard Vecino / Hussain Alsanona / Muhammad farhan Business supporters Again, coffee is community. During the project preparation, we received great support from the global coffee community who believe in our project and wish us success. Clever Dripper / E&B Lab Italy / Lilydrip / Melodrip / Home of coffee

story:
Unlike other coffee grinders or makers, ATONCE is an exceptional all-in-one coffee brewing system that provides fresh coffee at the push of a button to fuel your days and nights. No extra steps or complicated setup: start, grind, filter, brew and enjoy the fresh aroma and out-of-this-world taste in less than 5 minutes anytime, anywhere!

  • Ultra-Lightweight & Compact

700g only - ATONCE is unmatchably lightweight, space-saving and super portable. You can take it with you in your pocket or just put it into your backpack with ease. No matter if you're at home, working, camping, traveling, long-distance driving, anything!

  • ATONCE is All-in-One

ATONCE never settles when it comes to power and speed. Traditional coffee grinders or bulky coffee machines can’t meet your needs all at once. That’s why ATONCE is here for your caffeine-fueled daily desires with next-level portability, all-in-one structure and strength. With solid ceramic conical burrs, high strength stainless-steel shaft and twin ball bearing structure, ATONCE ensures every grind is uniform, steady and smooth, maintaining the original and natural flavor of your coffee!

  • Wide Range of Settings - Coarse to Fine

With 5 different grind settings from coarse to fine, you can easily create various specialty coffee drinks to perfectly match your mood and the occasion. ATONCE preserves the grind quality, freshness and original flavor of the beans. Take a moment as you raise your cup to enjoy the full, rich aroma that results from properly ground and expertly brewed coffee.

  • Stable Dual-Filter Basket

Traditional single-layer filters lack stable performance, while ATONCE gives you a more precise, consistent and thorough extraction with its premium-quality dual-filter basket that helps to control the acidity, sweetness, and balance in your brew so you get a perfect cup every time. No need for disposable paper filters, ATONCE is earth-friendly.

  • Water Flow Simulation & 15:1 SCA Golden Cup Ratio

Achieving a perfect pour-over coffee isn’t easy, it demands skillful water pouring and flow control techniques and professional quality brewing equipment. That’s why we created ATONCE. Its precise design flawlessly simulates the water flow and speed of a gooseneck kettle pouring 7.8oz (230ml) of water over 0.53oz (15g) of coffee to achieve the optimal water-to-ground coffee ratio of 15:1 the SCA golden cup standard.

  • Smart. Safe & Long-Lasting

Thanks to our intelligent induction motor, ATONCE will automatically turn off when grinding is completed. With up to 8+ hours of heat preservation, ATONCE beats your fatigue and warms your body and soul thanks to its ultra-safe materials and smart protections.

We care about conservation as well as coffee! Every year, 16 billion disposable coffee cups are used with only a fraction of them being recycled. ATONCE helps you do your part to change that. Our brewing system with reusable mugs means you can drink guilt-free and help to keep our environment cleaner and healthier. Say no to single-use cups!

  • Enhanced Motor for Stable Use

Lavida Coffee Team has chosen lower decibels motor, and adjust gear inside of motor module to low decibels by using more lubricating oil. ATONCE uses a high-speed motor, the noise of the motor is a little higher when the grinder work in empty, so our team managed to lower to noise for a better experience even it’s labour-consuming. You can enjoy a wonderful coffee experience with ultra-low noise.

  • New Function - Smart Auto Shutdown

With an enhanced motor, the grinding function will automatically stop in 7-10 seconds when finish grinding beans. Higher safety level and less energy,  you are free to enjoy your best cup of well-brewed coffee, anywhere, anytime. 

  • Battery Meets Higher Standard

The battery of ATONCE has earned UN DOT 38.3 and KC certificate, which is quite necessary for the process of international transportation. We rechoose batteries that meet the higher standards for the international market.

FCC & FDA are on testing for ATONCE,  and we will update you about the certification soon on the page.

  • Improved Burr Design

Compared with the burr of Coffee Traveller T2, the burr size of ATONCE is 27mm while the Coffee Traveller T2 is only 21mm. The better burr grinds smoothly, quickly dissipates heat and retains the natural flavor of the coffee. There is no reason to stop you from enjoying a good cup of coffee.

LAVIDA - La Vida, that’s life! Coffee enjoyment is rooted in our very being. We’re a group of coffee connoisseurs and enthusiasts who have a great desire for diving deep into the ultimate theory and magic of coffee and bringing it into your everyday life in an effortless and more joyful way. We make smart solutions for brilliant coffee!

LAVIDA ATONCE is our first project on Indiegogo. But we have strong supply chain and reliable factory to back us up. However, we need to inform you of certain risks and challenges as follows:

There might be some unforeseen problems in our production or delivery process, which might affect the final product or the promised delivery time. If anything goes wrong, we promise to keep our backers updated and informed about any issues and how we plan to solve them, so that you can know where your product is and when you will get it.

story:
Hi there! We're BOLT. 

We created the world’s first modular heated mug designed to go in the dishwasher.

 

To never deal with cold cups of coffee ever again, preorder your very own BOLT by clicking Back This Project or read on to learn more!

 

Most temperature controlled mugs are over-engineered, expensive, underperforming, and a pain to use. 

 

BOLT is a completely portable and rechargeable heated 10oz mug that maintains your drink at three ideal temperatures for 4+ hours.

BOLT is a completely portable and rechargeable heated mug.  At 11oz (10oz if you like adding cream) the BOLT maintains your drink at three ideal temperatures for 4+ hours. Unlike other solutions that barely last an hour, for the average coffee drinker it means you’ll only have to charge the BOLT twice per week. This dramatically reduces the cycle strain on the battery and drastically increases the life of the BOLT.

 

 

 

Control the temperature of your coffee or tea using simple capacitive one-touch controls.

  • Press and hold for any temperature setting
  • Tap-to-Wake LED panel
  • 15s auto-dim lighting system to reduce glare and conserve battery life 
  • Touch panel deactivates after 10s if no temperature is set to avoid accidental activations

How to Use the BOLT - A Simple Demonstration

 

 

 

 

BOLT is designed to all UL safety standards required for certification. It features an automatic shut-off in the base if no liquid or mug is present to make the BOLT safe to use at all times and to conserve battery life.

 

 

To regulate any liquid at a warm temperature you either have to A) add heat (energy) to the liquid or B) keep its existing heat from dissipating. BOLT does both. The BOLT MugTop is engineered with the most effective insulation system that features a double walled static air gap design and a food grade stainless steel inner liner that conducts and radiates heat back into the liquid. By prioritizing insulation within the MugTop, our engineering team was freed to create an intelligent base housing liquid level sensors, thermostatic controls and a light, yet powerful lithium ion battery. This combination provides more than enough heat to keep your drink warm for 4+ hours. Longer than any other heated mug on the market!

 

 

Using a bayonet mount, the BOLT Base and MugTop can be attached/detached with one easy click. Attach a fresh MugTop to an the existing base with plenty of remaining charge or swap in a new base with a full battery for that never-ending office meeting.  No clutter and no stationary charger required. 

 

 

The easily detachable MugTop is completely inert, sealed, and 100% waterproof. No handwashing needed. Just click, toss and go. Let the dishwasher do the rest. 

Any BOLT MugTop can be swapped out with a clean one while the dishwasher cycle is running. All MugTops are compatible wth the BOLT Base, regardless of colour. 

Each MugTop features a scratch-resistant, hair-brushed stainless steel surface that ensures whatever you drink from the BOLT tastes exactly how it’s supposed to taste.

The inert steel drinkware won’t chip, flake or corrode in your dishwasher, and you won’t end up with flecks of anything in your drink, or most importantly, your mouth.

 

The slim and lightweight design of the base blends seamlessly into the MugTop creating a sleek look and is easy to take anywhere. All mounting components are on the internal edge of the MugTop and Base, allowing you to store and use the MugTop as you would any other mug. 

 

Designed to fit under any standard counter coffee maker or espresso machine, the BOLT’s non-slip base prevents slips and spills. On the go? All BOLT MugTops come with a silicon gasketed Travel Lid to keep the cold out and your drink in. 

*You can select any colour option or combination of full unit colours at any perk level*

 

When engineering the BOLT, we didn't want to include some proprietary charging cord, cable, disk, plate or adapter that could only be used by the BOLT and the BOLT alone. Our users will be able to transport their BOLT worry free between the home and the office, even if you forget the charger behind.

So we made the BOLT smart enough to charge with any USB Type C chargers. 75% of the world uses Android phones, so odds are you ALREADY have a charger that works with the BOLT. If you use Apple laptops, then you ALSO probably have a charger that works. And even if you don't, there's always one included in the box. 

 

 

100% Delivery Guarantee:

The BOLT is ready to go. We have finished the engineering and design phase. We have finished the tooling phase. We have finished the testing phase. And we are ready to bring it to you. 

When you pledge you will be contributing directly to manufacturing your BOLT and you are guaranteed to receive your order. That is a promise from us to you. 

 

 

With the overwhelming success of our initial campaigns, we’ve been able to partner directly with FedEx, the worldwide leader in shipping and logistics, To offer our backers heavily discounted shipping rates on their highest priority options. The BOLT contains lithium Ion batteries that add a significant surcharge (3 - 4 times the cost) to any non-ground transportation options. We’ve been able to mitigate these fees through FedEx and the volume of orders going out. 

While other carriers might have slightly cheaper shipping alternatives, they are in no way comparable to what we’ve been able to secure with FedEx. Our FedEx packages arrive globally within 3-5 business days after fulfilment and include both tracking and at-your-door signature sign-off.

The safety and security of your package is incredibly important, because even the best products don’t  work if they arrive broken or get nabbed by porch pirates. 

This way you can be secure in the knowledge that your BOLT will arrive in your hands exactly the way it was intended.

We are also pleased to announce that we are offering FREE SHIPPING in North America on all orders that include 2 BOLTs or more.

For international backers who might not be able to see a shipping option or would like to discuss alternative carriers to their preferred locales, please feel free to contact us at support@boltmug.com 

We know that shipping tech products like ours internationally can come with some logistical questions, so we are more than happy to answer any you might have directly.

story:
Ready to enjoy wine in a sec!

 



Enjoy your favorite wine with just a press of the button!

 


Highly portable (125g) nearly ½ the weight of a cell phone!

 


Bring your own aerator to any occasion it’s that easy!

 


Just rinse with water and it’s clean!

 



Pick the color that suits your style!

 


 

[Venturi Effect] + [Solenoid Valve] + [Powered Pneumatic Process]
story_txt: Ready to enjoy wine in a sec! Enjoy your favorite wine with just a press of the button! Highly portable (125g) nearly ½ the weight of a cell phone! Bring your own aerator to any occasion it’s that easy! Just rinse with water and it’s clean! Pick the color that suits your style!  [Venturi Effect] + [Solenoid Valve] + [Powered Pneumatic Process]

story:
The reason that thermally insulated mugs are so good at retaining heat is that they exploit thermally insulating properties of air. We thought ‘what if you could do that for a collapsible mug?’

And so we developed a design accommodates ‘air’ gaps in the lid and on the sides to offer insulation for the beverage when it is in it's expanded form factor, which makes it up to 4X more heat retentive than other collapsible mugs.

 

There are 9 height options, so it fits into any barista coffee machine, or other drinks dispenser!

This is done by simply holding the ring that is to be collapsed to, and then using the same method as opening/closing the product, to move to the desired height level.

We worked really (really) hard to make sure that all common sizes at coffee shops were accommodated for, and yet can still easily fit into a pocket for convenience.

From our user research we found that for the majority of people and occasions, it's not often that above Venti / 600ml / 20 oz is needed, hence we aimed and designed for that. 

It was important to us from the start of development, that we needed to ‘defeat the sleeve’, almost as a mantra. They are a hassle to assemble and potentially lose, and really do not offer much in terms of cooling for holding (little/no air gap).

They also limit the area that you can hold the product, usually to about 4cm/1.5 inches. And from our experience of ergonomics, not many people have palms that are 4 cm /1.5 inches long. Well.. maybe babies, but they don't drink much coffee.

 

To make sure that hug is much better to open/close than a typical disposable mug, the main point of interaction is the mouthpiece.

And so intuitive ergonomic curves accommodate a thumb/finger in the two motions of both opening and closing. This sleek and chic design solution maximizes the grip area, and makes for a superior user experience.

 

When looking at other comparable collapsible mugs, what stood out to us is that they are naturally very flimsy due to mainly being made up of a soft silicone body.

Not only does it mean that you would be susceptible to accidentally squeeze it with your beverage going all over your lovely visage, but that when it is collapsed and compressed in your bag, the contents may spill onto your valuables = not fun.

 

By some estimates there are around 264 Billion non-biodegradable cups thrown away each year! Of which 99.75% are not recycled... = big problem.

 “Why are they non biodegradable?”

Because they have a plastic/Polyurethane liner.

 “Okay sounds bad, so why don’t people just use reusable mugs or cups?”

The main feature of disposable cups that makes them attractive is that they are so convenient, or more to the point, it's because reusable cups/mugs are so inconvenient.

However like for wallets and phones, most of us can accommodate smaller objects in pockets or the sides of bags.

So we made that the goal.. a collapsible mug that has a large capacity.. that's pocket friendly.. and then other cool features.

To compound on the convenience factor, an essential part of this is creating a way to quickly ‘draw’ your mug, and then collapse it when you are done. Hence we spent a lot of energy making sure it is one of, if not the fastest on the market.

 Both the lid section and the silicone inner liner have a Silver Ion (Ag) anti microbial agent additive, making it perfect for cleaning on the go.

The inner silicone is also easily removable and everything is dishwasher safe.

And if you want a deeper clean to get out any stubborn residues, the mouth plug is easily removable.

As the inner silicone is protected by the outer shell when in its collapsed form, it means that there isn't any compressing when on the move. 

We wanted to go one further than the standardized silicone quality of FDA and LFGB. to banish those plasticky tastes once and for all!

 

And so we have sourced and tested Nano Coated Medical Grade Silicone to use for production.

 

Through working with our supply chain, we have also made sure we are using the toughest grade/type of silicone that is on the market. 

 

There has been extensive testing on the prototypes that have been made to make sure that all angles in respect to quality for the final product have been accounted for.

The adjustable height + all encompassing insulation make it perfect for reheating when needed.

And from our experience of ergonomics, not many people have palms that are 4 cm /1.5 inches long. Well.. maybe babies, but they don't drink much coffee. To make sure that hug is much better to open/close than a typical disposable mug, the main point of interaction is the mouthpiece.And so intuitive ergonomic curves accommodate a thumb/finger in the two motions of both opening and closing. This sleek and chic design solution maximizes the grip area, and makes for a superior user experience. When looking at other comparable collapsible mugs, what stood out to us is that they are naturally very flimsy due to mainly being made up of a soft silicone body.Not only does it mean that you would be susceptible to accidentally squeeze it with your beverage going all over your lovely visage, but that when it is collapsed and compressed in your bag, the contents may spill onto your valuables = not fun. By some estimates there are around 264 Billion non-biodegradable cups thrown away each year! Of which 99.75% are not recycled... = big problem. “Why are they non biodegradable?”Because they have a plastic/Polyurethane liner. “Okay sounds bad, so why don’t people just use reusable mugs or cups?”The main feature of disposable cups that makes them attractive is that they are so convenient, or more to the point, it's because reusable cups/mugs are so inconvenient.However like for wallets and phones, most of us can accommodate smaller objects in pockets or the sides of bags.So we made that the goal.. a collapsible mug that has a large capacity.. that's pocket friendly.. and then other cool features.To compound on the convenience factor, an essential part of this is creating a way to quickly ‘draw’ your mug, and then collapse it when you are done. Hence we spent a lot of energy making sure it is one of, if not the fastest on the market. Both the lid section and the silicone inner liner have a Silver Ion (Ag) anti microbial agent additive, making it perfect for cleaning on the go.The inner silicone is also easily removable and everything is dishwasher safe.And if you want a deeper clean to get out any stubborn residues, the mouth plug is easily removable.As the inner silicone is protected by the outer shell when in its collapsed form, it means that there isn't any compressing when on the move. We wanted to go one further than the standardized silicone quality of FDA and LFGB. to banish those plasticky tastes once and for all! And so we have sourced and tested Nano Coated Medical Grade Silicone to use for production. Through working with our supply chain, we have also made sure we are using the toughest grade/type of silicone that is on the market.  There has been extensive testing on the prototypes that have been made to make sure that all angles in respect to quality for the final product have been accounted for.The adjustable height + all encompassing insulation make it perfect for reheating when needed.

story:
After a long day, all a coffee enthusiast wants is the perfect cup. But brewing an amazing cup of coffee doesn’t always seem worth it: unpacking your pour-over setup, washing everything, carefully measuring and grinding, making a mess in the kitchen, and worst of all it still doesn’t always come out the way you want it.

But a wise barista makes use of all the tools available- enter the Gevi 2-in-1, an all-in-one coffee grinder, and pour-over coffee machine, each element held to the most exacting professional-grade standards.

We’ve sent the first batch of prototypes to some professional baristas. Stay tuned for more unboxing videos and special recipes!

Coffee lovers know, grinding your coffee fresh for every cup provides the most flavor possible, and is a vitally important part of any kind of coffee process. Gevi begins with a commercial-grade burr grinding system featuring 60mm flat burrs, 51-step grind settings, and a built-in digital scale. It’s designed to provide the optimum coffee grounds with close to zero retention. Simplify your coffee-making routine, save counter space, and start making gold-standard cups of coffee, today.

When choosing a grinder, perhaps no virtue is as important as consistency- it helps you refine your technique and prevents distortion of your coffee’s flavors. That’s why, unlike traditional conical burr grinders, Gevi uses flat burrs to create more uniform micro-grounds and allow you to extract the maximum flavor, without heating up and distorting the flavor of your beans.

And, our high torque motor turns slowly for cool, quiet operation, so you won’t have to wake up the entire house to brew yourself a cup of coffee.

Different brewing methods need different grounds. It’s not enough to be consistent if you lack flexibility. That’s why Gevi's rotatable dial allows for 51 distinct grind settings, and it can process a wider variety of coffee beans to produce many different extraction levels. This way, you have complete control over exactly how your grounds turn out, every time, for any drink you like.

Additionally, the built-in scale provides automatic weight sensing and real-time display on the screen, for easy adjustment while experimenting or replicating your favorite recipe.

Gevi allows users to customize the grind function to exactly match their needs. You can select the number of cups to be made, or the grind time, or the weight of beans. Still too complicated? The Free Mode is the most straightforward way to get coffee grounds from beans. Just pause or resume anytime you want, without having to fill in any information.

 Additionally, the flat burr grinders are removable for easy cleaning, and are rated to last for 529 lbs of coffee beans! We estimate replacements won’t be needed for at least five years.

 

The technique for perfect pour-over coffee is straightforward and fun, but it requires a long time to perfect, and every iteration takes time and focus. Gevi is here to help you easily, quickly, and reliably reach that level.

The Gevi automatic mode is designed to ensure every cup achieves the Gold Cup Standard. Users only need to input 3 steps in Automatic Mode, so you won’t have to worry about hand grinding your beans, blooming grounds manually, or carefully monitoring the temperature, angle, and speed of each pour- Gevi can take care of all that for you!

Gevi’s team of baristas have done the work to set up a variety of presets to simulate the manual pouring of an experienced barista - we call it Gevi-Standard Baristial Coffee. You can get the same world-class quality for less attention and no matter your experience level, with Gevi.  Besides, we are already in the application process of ECBC  (European Coffee Brewing Centre) Gold Cup Certification to advance its own Barista mode even further.

Gevi uses three jet spouts that can rotate up to 360° and pour from 3 inches up, mimicking the movements of an experienced barista to ensure all coffee grounds come into contact with the water, for maximum flavor extraction. 

Sometimes you don’t want a standard recipe, instead, you need to just take things into your own hands. Gevi is a perfect backup, capable of exactly following your lead. 

In barista mode, every part of the grinding, heating, blooming, and brewing process can be sped up, slowed down, or even paused while you consider the next step in your masterwork. From the rotation speed and height of your pour to the temperature of the water, Gevi can help you experiment to find what best suits your taste.

Instead of following a recipe, use the progress bars and digital graphs to customize the process by feel. Try new combinations of brew ratios, brew speeds, and bloom times, then save them for future use. Virtually every part of the coffee-making experience can be saved and perfectly replicated whenever you need it to deliver unmatched consistency every time.

Found something that works for you? Give the recipe a name so you can call it up quickly, any time you like. Every time you feel like it, you can reproduce it perfectly, on-demand. Find something especially good? Share your unique recipe with a friend! Miss the cafe bonding experience? Gevi helps you share the exact same cup of copy, at the same time, with a loved one no matter where they are.  

Any high-performance machine needs occasional maintenance, and Gevi’s descaling mode makes it easy and painless. Simply add a certain amount of the descaler into the water tank and start cleaning. You can also click "second cycle" to begin the next round.

The Gevi comes with a cleaning brush and a coffee scoop neatly tucked away inside the hopper’s lid, so you’ll have everything you need to keep everything ship-shape.

Not at your best before your morning coffee? Gevi’s Beginner Mode displays instruction screens to guide you through the process. Experienced users can use Master Mode instead for a quicker experience, once they’ve got the hang of things.

There’s nothing worse than an obnoxiously loud coffee grinder waking up the whole house early in the morning. Not only does Gevi offer premium grinding quality, but we also understand how important quiet grinders can be for those early mornings. The Gevi grinding process takes less than a minute, and best of all the noise level is kept under 70 dB the whole time.

The constant temperature control system maintains water temperature at the desired brew temperature so you never risk scorching your coffee, and it warms up in under four minutes, saving you precious time in the mornings. 

You will have the option to choose the color after you choose a specific perk on the right top of the page. 

 

Please check the complete specs in the google sheet below, which includes not only the specs of the grinder and the brewer separately, but also the specific parameters for the machine recipe under Auto Mode in terms of the brew ratio, water volume, brew speed, bloom time, etc. 

https://drive.google.com/file/d/1HtU1Aa9AeH09eN...

Established in 2017, Gevi is a kitchen appliance brand from the USA that believes strongly in innovative design. Currently, the Gevi series produces coffee machines, air fryers, toasters, juicers, electric kettles, and more. They are sold in more than 30 countries, improving the quality of life for more than 1.5 million consumers across the USA, Europe, Southeast Asia, and the Middle East. Gevi has always strived to provide high-quality and reliable products for all our customers. 

For the past year and a half, our team has been working day and night to develop the Gevi 2-in-1 Coffee Grinder & Pour-over Machine. We visited more than a hundred pour-over coffee lovers and professionals to better understand their needs and concerns about using coffee machines, and we’ve worked hard to provide you with the best solution on the market today. 

We stand behind our products & services with full confidence. Gevi warranties the product for 1 year and will provide customer service to answer technical questions. Gevi will also warrant that each product purchased is free from defects in materials and workmanship, under normal use during the limited warranty period. *Please note that the warranty period complies with the applicable consumer laws in the consumer's country of purchase required.

We've already entered into the mass production stage with Indiegogo’s official verification. The estimated shipping will start in October. 

FREE shipping and no extra custom fee for orders to the US, CA & AU. We will first ship the products to local warehouses and then ship to backers through the local delivery options. 

For orders to UK and the most of countries in EU. Due to the new policy of VAT and customs fees, it’s difficult for us to cover all the costs after having provided the largest discount and covering a proportion of the shipping fees. So we will charge an additional 100USD for each machine for logistics with customs fees included. For orders to other countries and regions, we will ship the packages via air express directly, and charge a specific amount of shipping fee based on different shipping addresses.

 

  • Overview on Functions

 

  • Grind Pro Guide (From Espresso to French Press)

 

  • Machine Recipes Guide (Auto Mode)

 

  • My Recipes Guide (Custom Mode)

 

  • Barista Mode Guide (Free Mode)

 

  • Kettle Mode Guide (Water Boiling)

 

  • Descale Mode Guide (Clean & Maintain)

story:
Texts translated into French have the sign (FR) before.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Watch the amazing video Test of SCRUBBIO made by SortedFood >>

 

 

 

Scrubbio Plus is the latest generation of environmentally friendly silicone Brush for Kitchen & Bathroom. Magic for your Daily Life & Ultra Durable to preserve Nature.

Scrubbio Plus is 8-in-1 multifunctional made with recyclable & ultra durable high quality silicone.

It is magic ! With its magnetic power, you can put it where you need it most and is therefore instantly accessible.

Scrubbio can be uses as :

  • A Dish brush
  • A Potholder
  • A Trivet & Coaster
  • A Soap dish
  • A Vegetable brush
  • A Pet brush
  • A Spoon rest
  • A Shower brush for bathroom 

And even much more ...

 

 

(FR) Scrubbio est la dernière génération de brosses en silicone écologiques pour la cuisine et la salle de bain. Magique pour votre vie quotidienne et ultra durable pour préserver la nature.

Scrubbio est multifonction 8-en-1 fabriquée avec du silicone recyclable et ultra durable de haute qualité.

C'est magique ! Grâce à sa puissance magnétique, vous pouvez la déposer là où vous en avez le plus besoin. Elle reste ainsi instantanément accessible partout.

Scrubbio peut être utilisée comme:

  • Brosse à vaisselle
  • Manique
  • Dessous-de-plat & Sous-verre
  • Porte-savon 
  • Brosse à légumes
  • Brosse pour animaux
  • Repose-cuillère
  • Brosse pour salle de bain

Et bien plus encore ...

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

With Scrubbio Plus, you will offer a magical and pleasant moment to your pets. Scrubbbio Plus helps your pet get rid of hair before it falls on your carpet.

 

 

 


 

 

 

 

 

 

We are Designers and we are constantly looking for solutions to simplify our daily lives adapted to our times.

The 2 main daily observations that created Scrubbio are:

  • We have far too many similar items in our kitchen & bathroom.
  • To preserve Nature, we must drastically reduce our production of single-use products & daily products. We have to reduce our mass production.
  • We need more durable products.

This is why we created Scrubbio: to replace all similar and single-use products with only a simple product, thereby considerably reducing our production.

This product replaces many other products in your home and will decrease global production. You could also keep it and use it for years. Scrubbio is made with a recyclable & ultra-durable silicone. 

 

 

 

We must reduce our production of products to save nature. We have to produce durable and recyclable items easily.

 

 

 

 



 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

So FUN! Throw SCRUBBIO on any metal surface you want as a fridge or a credenza.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 


 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Please note: We don't have a lot of Oranges in stock anymore. In case of out of stock, this color will be replaced by Red or Yellow. Thank you for understanding.

After October 15th 2021, Orange won't be available anymore and will be replace by Yellow or Red if you select Orange.

 

 

No risk of receiving a broken product because Scrubbio is unbreakable ;)

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Yannick HESCH was born in France. He  studied at the European  Design Institute of France and obtained a  Master of Industrial Design at the University of Salford in England. He  has worked for more than 15 years as an industrial designer and graphic  designer. He works between Lyon and Paris and has already advised more  than 300 companies. He is passionate about everyday objects because he  thinks that one lives better when one is surrounded by beautiful and  good objects. He loves cooking and that why he has invented the ORIBOARD, the MEOMITT & of course SCRUBBIO ;) He has already won many awards for his work, including a medal at the Lépine International  Competition.

For the SCRUBBIO, this time, he will lead this project !

 

(FR) Yannick HESCH est né en France. Il a  étudié à l'Institut  Européen du Design de France et à obtenu un Master  de design industriel à  l'Université de Salford en Angleterre. Il  travaille depuis plus de 15  ans comme designer industriel et graphiste. Il travaille entre Lyon et Paris et a déjà conseillé plus de 300  entreprises. Il est passionné par  les objets du quotidien car il pense  que l'on vit mieux quand on est entouré de beaux et bons objets. Il  adore cuisiné et c'est pour cela  qu'il a inventé l'ORIBOARD, MEOMITT et bien sur SCRUBBIO ;) Il a obtenu de nombreux prix dont la  Médaille de bronze du Concours  Lépine et le Prix Lumières de la Société  Lyonnaise des Inventeurs et  des Artistes Industriels (SLIAI).

 

 

The SCRUBBIO TEAM was specially created for this project to monitor mass production, respond to your requests and make deliveries. It is ready to deliver thousands of SCRUBBIO worldwide before Christmas.

 

(FR) L'équipe SCRUBBIO a été créé spécialement pour ce projet pour suivre la production, répondre à vos demandes et réaliser les livraisons. Elle est prête à livrer des milliers de SCRUBBIO dans le monde entier avant Noël. 

SUZIE, the cat, is perfectly integrated into the project. She loves SCRUBBIO to get rid of his hair and have caresses. She also loves to play but is still very elegant and calm. She brings us a lot of happiness and helps the whole team to reduce their stress. Thanks Suzie.

(FR) SUZIE, le chat, est parfaitement intégré au projet. Il adore SCRUBBIO pour se débarrasser de ses poils et avoir des carresses. Elle adore aussi jouer mais est toujours très élégante et calme. Elle nous apporte beaucoup de bonheur et aide toute l'équipe à réduire son stress. Merci Suzie.

She loves SCRUBBIO to get rid of his hair and have caresses. She also loves to play but is still very elegant and calm. She brings us a lot of happiness and helps the whole team to reduce their stress. Thanks Suzie.(FR) SUZIE, le chat, est parfaitement intégré au projet. Il adore SCRUBBIO pour se débarrasser de ses poils et avoir des carresses. Elle adore aussi jouer mais est toujours très élégante et calme. Elle nous apporte beaucoup de bonheur et aide toute l'équipe à réduire son stress. Merci Suzie.

story:
Who we are

We're Elizabeth and Jonathan, a wife and husband team, and we LOVE food. We’re the owners of Vegos. A food business in Albuquerque with a focus on familiar and comforting dishes that are 100% vegan. We launched Vegos May 2019 at the local grower’s market with nothing but a couple tables and delicious food. From there we’ve grown into two food trucks and acquired as well as outfitted our very own commissary kitchen. In two years time, we have grown from a two-person team, into an six-person crew. Despite 2020’s hardships we worked harder than ever to serve our community. In this year, we won third best food truck in the city and second best chef by local paper Albuquerque Journal. In May 2021, only two years from our debut, we won Best Food Truck in the state of New Mexico by the Edible Magazine. We are humbled by these awards but know there is much more to achieve and much much more to cook! It is our goal to serve the community more consistently by offering a brick and mortar location.

How do we get there

With the great growth we’ve had in the last two years, it has come at a cost. We have invested $30k of our own money and we are paying on loans of $24k we have taken out to make this dream a reality. Because of these financial responsibilities it has slowed growth and the possibility of offering a storefront option to our customers. We can continue to serve through our food trucks but we would really love to showcase our kitchen and have a stable location with plenty of parking for everyone. We are asking your help to renovate our existing kitchen space into a beautiful walk-up option. We are asking for help with the renovations to transform this old pie shop into Albuquerque’s number one destination for vegan New Mexican food. This renovation would widely open our menu and allow us to whip up even more tasty dishes. Here’s the breakdown:

Total Space: 1,000 sq ft

  • Signage: $4,000
  • Décor/Furnishings: $4,000
  • Wifi/POS System/Security: $2,300
  • Menu board/ordering counter/cabinets/lighting/waiting area: $12,000
  • Total before tax: $22,300

We would love to offer as much seating as possible but with the limited space we will only be able to offer a waiting area at this time. However, having a brick and mortar location means we will no longer have to cancel service because of crazy wind or inclement weather. This also means, our menu is no longer restricted by what can and cannot be transported to our food trailer, which means fewer sell out days!

What it's all about

At Vegos our mission has always been to deliver delicious hearty vegan dishes that don’t break the bank. We want our customers to walk away feeling full and satisfied. We make food that appeals to everyone, omnivores and vegans alike! We believe good food is good food! We are passionate about food and believe it is important to show people through delicious flavors and textures just how satisfying a fully plant-based meal can be. We often hear things like “I can’t believe this is vegan” or “I don’t even miss the meat” and those are huge wins! But we think the greatest “win” of all is when our customers share our name with their friends and families.

We're turning heads

We believe in Vegos and people seem to believe in us too! 2020 was a tough year for a lot of businesses, ours included. However, we hustled and served as many days as we could, and at however many locations we could. Last year required adaptability in order to survive, and not only did we survive but we grew! In 2020 our Seitan Burrito was recognized by PETA as one of the Top 10 burritos in the country. This national recognition gained notice from our local community and we were featured in our local newspaper the Albuquerque Journal. In November 2020 we were listed as the top 10 local destinations for tamales in Albuquerque and we've been featured in the New Mexico magazine as a plant-based destination. From there we were voted 3rd Best Food Truck in the city and Elizabeth was voted 2nd Best Chef in the city! At the time we were only a year old but we kept pushing. We credit a large amount of our success to our amazing customers but also to our determination to succeed! In May of 2021 we were named The Best Food Truck in the State of New Mexico by National Publication the Edible Magazine and we are seeking to raise funds to help us grow even more! 

There is no doubt that this industry can be challenging and hard but we believe we’ve proven our willingness to overcome adversity, even in the wake of overwhelmingly difficult odds. We love our community and know that this town deserves more. Raising these funds would mean we would have a centrally located kitchen, for our customers to easily reach us. Our kitchen is located on Carlisle Blvd between Montgomery Blvd and Comanche in the old NM Pie Company space. It's a 5 minute drive to either interstate, making is easily accessible. While we would love a space that offers seating, our current kitchen is just too small for that. Instead,  this space offers customers the option to walk up and place their order with us on a consistent basis. Unlike the food truck world, where people have to check our website and social media pages to see where we are located, this space would give them a dependable place to go to grab their vegan comfort food.  We believe in Vegos and we are dedicated to serving our community. We would love your help in making this dream a reality! Let us serve you in a walk-up brick and mortar location! 

How do we make dining space a reality now?

There is a vacancy in the space next to us that used to be an old hair salon for 20+ years. The idea would be to knock down part of the wall and connect our current space with this new one. We would transform the old hair salon building into a beautiful dining room and we would use our current space to expand our kitchen. To be honest this was our initial goal. We worked with a contractor and got the following specs. The price was higher than we were hoping for which is why this campaign is targeted toward renovating our existing space instead, a much more affordable project. However, in the interest of transparency we wanted to share the following numbers with you. If you were hoping for Vegos to turn into a sit down dining restaurant, there is a way! If we are able to raise the following funds then Vegos could build a beautiful dining area for guests to enjoy their tasty New Mexican cuisine in. 

Total Space: 1,200 sq ft

Seating to start: up to 48 ppl

  • Signage: $4,000
  • Wifi/POS System/Security: $2,300
  • Bathroom renovation: $5,500
  • Demo and new construction of framing/walls/flooring/trim/electrical: $38,711
  • Menu board/ordering counter/cabinets/kitchen entryway/lighting/waiting area: $12,000
  • Booths/Tables/Chairs: $10,415
  • Total after tax: $78,661

We are grateful for all your consideration and donations of any size! 

Thank you for your time and reading about our little dream. We understand not everyone can contribute financially but there are still other ways you can help. Please share this campaign with your friends, family and even complete strangers! Let’s make some noise and get the word out. Albuquerque deserves a 100% vegan New Mexican eatery and we would love Vegos to be it!

story:
The ULTIMATE accessory for whiskey connoisseurs. 

 

This is where it all got started.   

“We searched high and low for options to add a smokey finish to our favorite spirits. We had three simple requirements: It cannot break the bank, it must be portable, and it needs to last a lifetime.”

 

Unlike other spirit smokers, Hazey’s unique design and the material will infuse pure wood aroma into your favorite spirit without any interfering scent from the smoker itself. 

With its distinctive design, Hazey brings the most intense aroma of the wood chips into your drink. Watch the mesmerizing smoke rise up as you open up the lid, and get ready to be wowed by the robust and luscious smell & flavors that your Hazey can bring!

Pick what suits your mood and spirit.  

All premium wood chips are sourced in the USA for the best quality.  

Re-define the spirit tasting experience at home. 

 

https://hazey-cocktail-whiskey-smoker.kickbooster.me/boost

Earn 20% cash back for helping us spread the word! by Kickbooster.

story:
Our Story

 Jack-B's is a tiny 100% Takeout restaurant located in the heart of Downtown Findlay.  It is owned by husband and wife:  Brenden and Sherie Butler.

The restaurant is named after  Brenden's Dad:  Jack Butler, who died of Esophageal cancer in 2004.  Brenden was very close to his Father, and he has always had a passion for cooking and the food industry. Before Brenden moved back to be with his dying Father in 2004, he was close to starting up a new Restaurant/Cafe in Ft. Myer's Beach, FL.

Brenden chose to walk away from that opportunity in order to spend time with his Dad during his last days on earth.  His dream from that point forward, and promise to his Dad, was to run his own restaurant, and name the business after his Father.

Sixteen years later, Brenden and his wife Sherrie, are seeing Brenden's dreams come alive.  The dream of running his own restaurant has come true...and now it is time for more!

 "Since opening our small take-out restaurant in the spring of 2018, we've been blessed with an incredibly supportive community.  Each day we continue to see new faces, and we are reaching maximum capacity and bursting at the seams of our small space. Our customers mean the world to us.  We have built meaningful relationships, and our Jack-B's family has become HUGE.   After hearing so many of our loyal patrons ask us when we were opening up a bigger location, we're now finally ready to take the next step."   

 

What We Need From You

We know we can’t open a second location without capital.  Therefore; our first priority must be "funding."  While we have been trying very hard to save, the reality is that it just isn't enough.  We need your help to raise $77,777 (Our lucky 7's).  With your support, we'll be able to put the money towards the following: 

  • ​​Walk in Cooler
  • Kitchen Equipment 
  • Building Lease
  • Walk in Freezer
  •  Interior/Exterior Decor/Remodel
  • Lighting
  • Food Inventory for Start up
  • Start-up costs
  • Restaurant and Office Supplies
  • Shelves for supplies
  • Staffing
  • Marketing and Advertising
  • Insurance / Inspections / Certifications
  • Needed improvements/repairs at existing location 

 

 What You Get:  Your Support makes the Difference

  •   Jack-B's doesn't just want a handout.  We want you to help support our venture, and be along for the ride.  With that said, we are excited to offer you some great Perks for your support, because we want to GIVE BACK to you!  Perks will consist of things like keychains, gift certificates,  free food,  Jack-B's swag, and even the possibility of a menu item being named after you!  Each individual supporter will also have their name permanently posted on a "Wall of Appreciation" at the next location.   Just give what you can by selecting your "perk level," or pushing the "back it" button on the campaign.

 

The Impact

  • Your support is essential to our success.  Thank you so much for reading and learning about our campaign.
  • If we exceed our goal, funds will be reinvested into both Jack-B's locations, and/or a Food Truck.  Jack-B's has big plans, but this is only the beginning. We can't do it without you and we are looking forward to serving you some more Jack-B's Goodness-To-Go!

 

Risks & Challenges

  • Available and Affordable Locations are VERY hard to find.  We have already had our eye on a few places in town, but later found they were simply unattainable.
  •  Planning, licenses, inspections and regulations can all throw up potential problems, but that is always unknown until you come up against it.
  • The Pandemic has altered the restaurant industry.  We understand that staffing issues currently continue to be a problem.  Our model has survived because we are able to run our business with low overhead. 

. We understand there is always the potential for problems, but we are determined and dedicated to push forward no matter what.  We are willing to take on the risks and challenges.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

We understand that not everyone can contribute monetarily, and that is completely understandable! The good news is that there are other ways you can help! You can help spread the word about our campaign using the "Share" tool on this site. Also, please consider posting our link on Facebook and through Twitter or Instagram. The more the word gets out, the sooner we reach our goal and get this ball rolling! <3

 

WE APPRECIATE YOU!

Thank you again for your time and attention! There are not enough words to express how much it means to us, and how much we love our Jack-B's FAMILY! 

If you aren't familiar with who we are, here are links to our website and Facebook page to help you get to know us:   

http://www.jackbsfindlay.com

 http://www.facebook.com/jackbsfindlay/

story:
Short Summary

 InKETOble! Treats is a low carb, no sugar healthy desserts company. We pride ourselves on making sweets that taste sinfully delicious you won't even know they are keto. Our journey started in September 2020  and all of the hard work is paying off and the business has taken off! We have an established presence online and at local farmers' markets and the demand has been growing ( we have reached almost 33,0000 searches on google in the last 30 days). I have decided to expand the brand and open up the first of its kind, a casual cafe and bakery that will be keto and diabetic-friendly, and low carb-focused. This will include the appetizers, entrees, alcoholic and non-alcoholic offerings, and of course the desserts.

We have found the perfect location in Midtown Manhattan! The address is 226 E 53rd St NY,NY 10022. Lease is signed and the space is currently being built out. The target opening date is MONDAY, NOV 15th!  As I am sure you are aware running a restaurant cost a pretty penny and we are reaching out to our network to assist in startup cost for some awesome perks in return for your kind contributions. :)

What We Need & What You Get

Total : $50,500

Funds Breakdown: 

  • Certificate of Occupancy - $100
  • Business License - $120
  • Food Service Establishment Permit  - $280
  • Health and Building Inspections - $1000
  • Beer and Wine License - $1,060
  • Signage, Décor, Marketing - $2,438
  • Equipment - Electric Bakers Oven, Refrigerator/Freezer, 3 Compartment Sink, Electric Stove, Rolling Prep Table. $10,000
  • 2 Months Operating Cost - $35,502
    • Includes : Rent (4,550), Taxes, Insurance, Payroll, Food Cost, Materials, Utilities, Gas, Internet, Accounting and Legal Services. 
  • We have some fabulous perks for your contributions including  InKETOble branded swag, our famous seasonal dessert boxes, gift cards to online and in store orders, and more. 
  • Our goal is to reach our goal and exceed it to assist in the startup funds and working capital, however if we do not reach our goal the funds will still be used towards the business and operating capital. 

The Impact

  • There are no readily accessible Keto-friendly restaurants in NYC. This will solve the issue of not only a sit-down casual café but also a full-service bakery that customers can pick up grab-and-go options as well.
  • Representation - There very few black owned restaurants in NYC outside of Harlem and Brooklyn. InKETOble! Treats and Eats will help break that mold by being one of the few and hopefully will inspire the younger generation that they can make it happen too.
  • All-Encompassing - We are a one-stop-shop for all things keto, from appetizers to entrees, desserts, and drinks, it will be the first of its kind.
  • Mass Appeal - Not only do we cater to the keto market, but we also cater to the gluten-free, and diabetic community.
  • Location -NYC is the most densely populated area
  • Filling a community void - The concept is community-based that will host weekly community events ( trivia, drag bingo, karaoke) which is currently not largely offered in the area.
  • Established Following - We also have an established following and clientele from our online orders and the local farmer's markets.
  • Growing Demand- The demand is there and substantially growing. As shown in the imagery below we had thousands of google searches and dozens of phone calls over the last 30 days alone. These searches would have translated into sales if we were a brick and mortar which is the opportunity we are solving with the InKETOble Kitchen.

 

Risks & Challenges

  • Niche - This is a very niche restaurant that can appeal across the board but it may be a hard concept to understand, for some consumers.
  • Previous Bad Experience - Those consumers who have a negative connotation to the keto diet or are not familiar with it or low carb foods, in general, might hesitate to give the restaurant a try.
  • NYC Competition- NYC is a competitive restaurant landscape with a revolving door of restaurants.
  • Food Cost Education - Due to the fact that keto-friendly substitutions such as almond flour and monk fruit (sugar substitute) are at a significantly higher price point, some consumers might be deterred from the higher price points of the menu items versus the price point of a traditional bakery/

Other Ways You Can Help

Please feel free to share and spread the word to friends and family alike. 

More Info About InKETOble and the Owner 

The seed for this company was planted when Chef Tiara decided to embark on a life-changing journey and lifestyle change with the KETO diet. Chef Tiara lost 35lbs on the KETO diet while still having delectable desserts. Chef Tiara noticed there was a gap in the market of delicious treats that did not taste like they were "diet" or healthy foods. Using her decade of experience in the culinary industry, Chef Tiara crafted a scrumptious seasonal menu of her favorite recipes and created InKETOble! Treats.

Tiara has 10 years of culinary experience in both Front of House operations as well as Back of House Operations. Her expertise includes Head Chef and Chief of Operations for Sugar and Spice Catering company for three years. Tiara's background also includes training and bartending operations. She also has 2 years of experience as a project manager on projects with budgets up to 500k.

Our journey started in September 2020  and all of the hard work is paying off and the business has taken off! We have an established presence online and at local farmers' markets and the demand has been growing ( we have reached almost 33,0000 searches on google in the last 30 days). I have decided to expand the brand and open up the first of its kind, a casual cafe and bakery that will be keto and diabetic-friendly, and low carb-focused. This will include the appetizers, entrees, alcoholic and non-alcoholic offerings, and of course the desserts.
We have found the perfect location in Midtown Manhattan! The address is 226 E 53rd St NY,NY 10022. Lease is signed and the space is currently being built out. The target opening date is MONDAY, NOV 15th!  As I am sure you are aware running a restaurant cost a pretty penny and we are reaching out to our network to assist in startup cost for some awesome perks in return for your kind contributions. :)

What We Need & What You Get
Total : $50,500
Funds Breakdown: 

Certificate of Occupancy - $100
Business License - $120
Food Service Establishment Permit  - $280
Health and Building Inspections - $1000
Beer and Wine License - $1,060
Signage, Décor, Marketing - $2,438
Equipment - Electric Bakers Oven, Refrigerator/Freezer, 3 Compartment Sink, Electric Stove, Rolling Prep Table. $10,000
2 Months Operating Cost - $35,502Includes : Rent (4,550), Taxes, Insurance, Payroll, Food Cost, Materials, Utilities, Gas, Internet, Accounting and Legal Services. 

We have some fabulous perks for your contributions including  InKETOble branded swag, our famous seasonal dessert boxes, gift cards to online and in store orders, and more. 
Our goal is to reach our goal and exceed it to assist in the startup funds and working capital, however if we do not reach our goal the funds will still be used towards the business and operating capital. 


The Impact

There are no readily accessible Keto-friendly restaurants in NYC. This will solve the issue of not only a sit-down casual café but also a full-service bakery that customers can pick up grab-and-go options as well.
Representation - There very few black owned restaurants in NYC outside of Harlem and Brooklyn. InKETOble! Treats and Eats will help break that mold by being one of the few and hopefully will inspire the younger generation that they can make it happen too.
All-Encompassing - We are a one-stop-shop for all things keto, from appetizers to entrees, desserts, and drinks, it will be the first of its kind.
Mass Appeal - Not only do we cater to the keto market, but we also cater to the gluten-free, and diabetic community.
Location -NYC is the most densely populated area
Filling a community void - The concept is community-based that will host weekly community events ( trivia, drag bingo, karaoke) which is currently not largely offered in the area.
Established Following - We also have an established following and clientele from our online orders and the local farmer's markets.
Growing Demand- The demand is there and substantially growing. As shown in the imagery below we had thousands of google searches and dozens of phone calls over the last 30 days alone. These searches would have translated into sales if we were a brick and mortar which is the opportunity we are solving with the InKETOble Kitchen.

 

Risks & Challenges

Niche - This is a very niche restaurant that can appeal across the board but it may be a hard concept to understand, for some consumers.
Previous Bad Experience - Those consumers who have a negative connotation to the keto diet or are not familiar with it or low carb foods, in general, might hesitate to give the restaurant a try.
NYC Competition- NYC is a competitive restaurant landscape with a revolving door of restaurants.
Food Cost Education - Due to the fact that keto-friendly substitutions such as almond flour and monk fruit (sugar substitute) are at a significantly higher price point, some consumers might be deterred from the higher price points of the menu items versus the price point of a traditional bakery/


Other Ways You Can Help
Please feel free to share and spread the word to friends and family alike. 
More Info About InKETOble and the Owner The seed for this company was planted when Chef Tiara decided to embark on a life-changing journey and lifestyle change with the KETO diet. Chef Tiara lost 35lbs on the KETO diet while still having delectable desserts. Chef Tiara noticed there was a gap in the market of delicious treats that did not taste like they were "diet" or healthy foods. Using her decade of experience in the culinary industry, Chef Tiara crafted a scrumptious seasonal menu of her favorite recipes and created InKETOble! Treats.Tiara has 10 years of culinary experience in both Front of House operations as well as Back of House Operations. Her expertise includes Head Chef and Chief of Operations for Sugar and Spice Catering company for three years. Tiara's background also includes training and bartending operations. She also has 2 years of experience as a project manager on projects with budgets up to 500k.

story:
UK's First Natural-Rinded Matured Vegan Cheese

About

Hey, my name is Sumear.

I am the hard vegan cheese & long-aged cheese specialist here in Bristol, UK.

My job is to create authentic vegan cheese using the experience and techniques as an ex-dairy cheesemaker. By creating the cultures from scratch and understanding the science of cheesemaking, I am able to develop well rounded flavoured cheeses while achieving the right texture.

With flavours & textures similar to dairy, there are no artificial flavours or artificial preservatives. Everything is free-from soy, miso and even free from nutritional yeast. The cultures and good old fashion dairy cheesemaking practices help develop a true natural cheese flavour without any tricks.

This Plantbased Creamery has become a successful at-home-business since 2018 but it is time to branch out into a new commercial space. The local & loyal passionate cheese-lovers have helped make this business a success. And now it is time to branch out more across the UK.

The Food by Sumear cheese range has been highly rated since it started. Check out the review over on foodbysumear.co.uk.

Press Attention - I've been in the news as well.

To learn more on the Perks/Rewards, please click onto them to read the description. Get in touch if you have any questions :)

Funding to Build the New Commercial Kitchen and Rebuilding of the Specialist Cheese Cave

A new commercial building has already been purchased, and the build of the new kitchen is underway. However money is tight so the expansion project will take several months, to a year, to complete fully. The business is trading as normal with production currently taking place in the at-home location, however the new commercial location will push the business into new developments of vegan cheesemaking.

The expansion into a commercial premises will help increase production to meet demand, increase accessibility by lowering costs and RRPs, allowing for new products, open opportunities for employment, but more importantly bring back the UK's FIRST natural rinded matured vegan cheeses. These wonderful marvels require a hyper sensitive cheese maturing room which broke down last year. So a better version will be built in the new location.

While I accept the project expansion will be slow without outside funding, crowdfunding has been recommended by loyal fans to speed up the process to bring this project to life quicker, bigger and better, with high-end facilities and equipment.

I love developing vegan cheeses and sharing them with fellow cheese lovers but for this business and my passion to really work I need to grow bigger and quicker than ever before.

What is needed

Funding of £5000 will help get the base kitchen ready in a few months and get the current range of vegan cheese out to more people and independent stockists around the UK.

An extra £2000 will help obtain cold-rooms for storing vast amounts of cheese to cater for more stockists.

An extra £10-15,000 will help pay for specialist cheese maturing experts to build the cheese cave the right way. This would indefinitely bring back the natural rind cave aged vegan cheese without any problems that occurred in 2020.

The business is successful, slow growing micro-business, so with any form of funding will push the business further in a positive route. The more money received means the projects that were projected to be completed next year, will be completed sooner.

A load of perks have been created to get funding from getting the vegan cheese, to private events and learning from a cheese master. Please click onto the Perks to read more on what you get and when. If you have any questions on these rewards, please do get in touch. More information on the rewards relating to learning from myself in the world of cheesemaking can be provided. 

Risks & Challenges

Risk is pretty low. The business is still strong where production is ongoing and sales are being made. The new commercial building has already been purchased with zero debt owed to anyone. A unit next door has been rented with an option to buy in two years.

The business reinvestments, and personal money, both equating in total to over £60,000 has already been invested in these new projects

With a personal financial stake in the business, the project can be deemed as low risk, with rewards purchased being zero-risk.

Any funding will be used in a positive manner to complete the project. The crowdfunding will help cement the business into the ground for time to come against the every growing vegan cheese industry here in the UK.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't fund this project, there are other ways to help :)

You are able to buy cheese right now from stockists around the UK and directly online via foodbysumear.co.uk

Sharing this page to your family, friends, other vegans will massively help as well! This business has only grown from word of mouth by the fans and will continually do so. So please share as much as possible on social media :)

story:
Nutrition is essential for athletic performance. 

Food is fuel:

  • No food = no energy
  • No energy = poor performance
  • Poor performance = frustration, anger, sadness, disappointment. 

 

 

Any serious athlete will tell you that nutrition plays a pivotal role in performance.  The STRONGFAST nutrition bar is scientifically formulated to help youth athletes get the nutrition they need to perform their best when they need to most.

You put so much into helping your kid succeed. Don’t let poor nutrition undo all the time, effort, and hard work your kid puts into their dream.

 

    Nothing is better than seeing your child succeed. 

    You'll do anything to help your son or daughter do their best. You'll stay up late, get up early, drive them everywhere, spend money on equipment, book private lessons... the list goes on. Why do you put yourself through it?

    Because nothing is better than the joy on your kid's face when their hard work pays off.

     

    Is nutrition holding your kid back?

    Most kids don't get proper nutrition. This isn't news. But youth athletes face particular challenges when it comes to getting proper nutrition.

    Kids who are playing in weekend tournaments with three, four, or five games in a weekend and are practicing multiple days per week on top of that often find their fuel in one of three ways:

    • Gas station food, concession stands, and drive-thrus
    • Sugary sports drinks
    • Energy drinks

     

    Fast food and concessions don't typically offer healthy or nutritious options. Some sports drinks contain up to 200% of the daily recommended value of added sugars in a single bottle. And energy drinks are flat out dangerous for youth athletes.

    Time, energy, and availability make it harder than ever for youth athletes to get the healthy fuel they need to be their best. Colleges and professional sports pay millions of dollars to ensure their athletes have the right nutrition. Our kids deserve proper nutrition too. 

     

     

    This is where STRONGFAST comes in.

    We've developed a nutritional bar based on the most current FDA recommendations for 8-15 year old athletes. The formula has been reviewed by nutritionists, pediatricians, and neuroscientists because parents and coaches should feel absolutely confident in what they are putting in their athlete’s bodies. Ingredients should be great for you, with no fluff. Nothing artificial. Nothing grown in a lab. Here are the highlights: 

    • The bar is gluten free, lactose free, non-GMO, preservative free, and free from any and all artificial colors, sweeteners, or flavors.
    • The bar tastes delicious, because flavor matters more to kids than it does to adults. 
    • The bar is big, but not too big. Many bars for kids are more like snack bars for lunch boxes. They're too small to fuel athletic performance. Protein bars for adults are often too big or have high levels of certain macronutrients that can cause stomach problems.

     

    We're ready to get these bars into sports bags across the country.

    After a year of research and development, more than five rounds of prototypes, and reviews from food scientists, neuroscientists, pediatricians, and nutritionists, we're ready to get the STRONGFAST nutrition bar into mass production:

    • We conducted a nation-wide search and spent hours in interviews and have found a co-manufacturer in Florida who has the experience, quality certifications, and passion for our project that we need to get the bars mass produced to our standards of quality.
    • The nutrition bar is gluten free, lactose free, non-GMO, preservative free, and free from any and all artificial colors, sweeteners, or flavors. We couldn't have just anyone produce it!
    • Every penny we make through this campaign will go to our initial order of product. 

     

     

    Every project has its share of risks. The greatest risk in a project like this is scale. Food products like this really work best when they are being mass produced. Co-manufacturers are set up for orders of 10,000,000 easier than 10,000. The larger our order, the less our costs, the more affordable we can make the bars to consumers.

story:
Let’s Talk Nutrition! At BUZZD, we don’t mess around. Our blends are made with only the highest quality ingredients so that you can get the most out of yourself.  We hand select each ingredient and consciously source locally from Canadian wholesalers.  Add it to coffee, smoothies and oatmeal!

 

FUN FACT: When you combine a healthy fat like coconut milk powder and MCT powder to coffee, it SLOOOOWS down the metabolization of caffeine.  This helps you avoid those unwanted ‘coffee jitters’ and provides you with sustained energy and mental alertness!

We have our packaging DONE, distributors in place for the ingredients… We’re ready to go and ready to help you make a positive difference in your life with Superfoods! 

Pledging to our campaign will allow us to purchase our first round of inventory, fulfill our first round of orders and get those orders out in a timely manner! Who else gets a little impatient waiting for an order in the mail? We definitely do!!

 

If you don’t love our BUZZD blend as much as we do, don’t sweat it!  Send it back within 30 days and we’ll give you a full refund!

 

Absolutely NOT! We can’t wait to give you even more amazing blends to enhance your recipes and life.  Here’s some of the future products you can look forward to:

Package design and recipe DONE! Coming this Fall, we can’t wait for you to feel the difference that BUZZD Infused with Collagen can make to your ligaments, joints, hair, nails and skin.  

We’re HUGE fans of functional mushrooms like Lions Mane, Chaga and Cordyceps.  As a culture, we’re only just beginning to understand the importance of incorporating functional mushrooms into our diet! They’ve got amazing properties that help to improve athletic performance, cardiovascular health, brain optimization and immune system functioning (just to name a few…). We’re excited to show you how good they can taste too when our BUZZD Infused with Mushrooms launches!

story:
The full set of our Moulin Salt and Pepper grinders together with their custom made caddy. Luxurious engineering that follows you in style from the kitchen prep counter to your tabletop.

 

Whether you want a sprinkle or shower of salt, Moulin makes it effortless with 10x more output than standard mills and 10+ adjustable grind options. To top it off, its exquisite, minimalist design enhances any kitchen or dining setting. 

 

 

 

 

Moulin lets you control salt size and volume with a simple twist.

 

Instead of putting your coarse-grain, medium-grain, and finishing salts in 3 different bowls, Moulin has 10 grinding levels so you can adjust with precise granularity to the ideal size.

The external dial hits everything between a fine powder (around 0) and a coarser grain (around 9). It technically goes "below 0" and "above 9”, plus in between each number, giving you 50+ grind options.

 

 0 Powder Salt — Great for adding flavor to dishes you wouldn’t want to bite into and feel a grain of salt like homemade guacamole, dips, popcorn and sauces.

 
 3 Fine Grain Salt —Perfect for adjusting the final level of saltiness of a dish like roasted vegetables, fish or pasta, much like the use of finishing salt (fleur de sel).
 
 5 Medium Grain Salt —A must have for seasoning meat to pull proteins out from the inside before and during cooking, helping achieve caramelization as you cook without worrying about over-salting.
 
 9 Coarse Grain Salt —Give it a few robust turns to salt your pasta water and make it burst with flavor, akin to Gros Sel. 

 

The Moulin Salt Mill beats the pants off any other salt or pepper mill you’ve had in your hands because it was designed with intentional purpose from the inside out.

Bearings & Burrs: Moulin Salt Mill uses alumina ceramic burrs and zirconia ceramic bearings specifically, because ceramic is rust and corrosion resistant.

Interior Chamber & Exterior Finish: 6061 aerospace-grade, anodized aluminum. There is no paint to chip off or leach into the salt to contaminate it. It’s highly scratch resistant and will last a lifetime (or many!) of serious use.

Gentle Bottom Ring: There’s a 316L stainless steel retaining ring (the same grade as used on high-end watches) on the bottom so Moulin sits nicely on any table without damaging the surface. It’s insert molded with a Viton ring (like in Formula 1 car engine gaskets) so it will never peel off.

Lid: We integrated powerful Neodymium magnets into the lid to hold it on firmly during use, but still allow it to be pulled off when needed for quick refilling.

 

 

Despite the science, most “designer” and “pro-grade” salt mills use grinding mechanisms made of steel. And it doesn’t matter if it’s steel, stainless steel or carbon steel—eventually, salt corrodes all 3.

This is the main reason we don’t recommend putting salt in the complementary Moulin Pepper Mill—it’s made of stainless steel which is ideal for pepper as it doesn’t corrode like salt.

You don’t have to worry about what you put in Moulin. Large-grained salts, either refined from saltwater or mined salts like pink himalayan are fine. We simply recommend not to fill it with wet salt or fibrous spices, like cardamom.

 

Moulin Salt Mill’s chamber fits approximately 90 grams of large-granule salt. This will vary depending on granule size and packing density.

 

And when it’s empty, refilling has never been easier. Just pull and  "pop" the top off. Once filled, pop the lid back on and it will gravity-feed back on by floating down on a pocket of air.

Plus, corrosion-resistant materials mean this won’t be hard to open for refills, ever.

Weber went on to be in charge of implementing the glass screen for the first iPhones, but ultimately left Apple after 13 years to found Weber Workshops (WW). 

Their first product was a commercial-grade electric coffee grinder, and the team used that same expertise to redefine another frustrating kitchen item: the pepper mill. Moulin Pepper Mills have been such a success that naturally customers are asking for its companion: the Moulin Salt Mill.

Weber created the matchless product you see today by rethinking the standard salt mill at Apple-level detail and delivering it at Apple-level quality.

Weber created the matchless product you see today by rethinking the standard salt mill at Apple-level detail and delivering it at Apple-level quality.

 

 

 

 

As a long-time Product Design Engineer at Apple, I learned the difference between products created with purpose and those made for the sake of sales.

On top of wasting resources and costing us and the environment more in the long term, these products don’t provide a quality user experience or spark joy in our daily lives.

In the case of salt shakers and mills, the cheap ones are full of additives and barely work, while the supposedly high-end ones end up barely lasting longer than the $4 ones.

Unlike cell phones, when these items are built with purpose and integrity, they can continue to serve us and improve our quality of life on a daily basis for decades, if not longer. That’s something I get excited about.

As anyone with an Apple product can attest, the quality, look, and feel of any Apple product genuinely enhances the experience of using it. The designers and engineers spent innumerable hours sweating the details people didn’t even realize existed, and as products, that puts them on a different plane than the “cheaper” versions available at Walmart.

You take quality photos with your iPhone to capture memories that are actually worth looking at later. It all adds up. This is especially true with cooking and eating. Both processes use the senses — taste, smell, touch, sight and even hearing — and the Moulin Mill greatly enhances both the cooking experience and the flavors of eating.

This is all to say that we all enjoy high-quality products that deliver. They enhance our quality of life. That’s why Moulin Salt—and all Weber Workshops products for that matter—matter.

 

 

 

Rainfactory is a multiple-award-winning crowdfunding marketing agency that operates as a marketing department for growing brands. Rainfactory’s experienced team & data-driven, battle-tested approach ensure long-term market dominance for DTC eCommerce start-ups.
