story:
Love peanut butter but hate it when your bread rips under your knife?

Tired of getting out the knife and scraping the jar?

Does peanut butter time always mean a mess, especially with kids?

Need exact measurements for consistent baking and recipes?

 

The Peanut Butter Pump is your perfect solution!

 

 

  • Use on different kinds of nut butters - even crunchy peanut butter!
  • Many features specifically designed for easy cleaning.
  • Mechanism scrapes sides of the jar as you use it to get the most peanut butter you can!

 

 

 

Not only is the Peanut Butter Pump a great way to get the exact amount of peanut butter you need for sandwiches, smoothies, cookies, and hundreds more recipes, without the hassle of cleaning spoons or measuring cups.

The Peanut Butter Pump cleans the jar, so you don’t have to! Recycle without rinsing!

Once in use, no need to unscrew the lid! Small hands can use the peanut butter pump with ease without making a mess or struggling with a tight jar lid. Getting peanut butter has never been this easy!

Need a bunch of snacks in a hurry? Feed hungry kids on the go!

Easily assembled and disassembled for simple cleaning and dishwasher safe!

 

 

 

Easy treats for your pet, use it to fill your dog’s toy or to help them enjoy taking their medicine.

WARNING: Keep out of reach of dogs. You KNOW how much they love peanut butter and will do anything to get to it!

 

We made the Peanut Butter Pump to work with most 40 ounce containers on the market, so you won’t need to switch brands to use it.

 

Yes! It works on crunchy peanut butter, almond butter, and more. It should only be used for stabilized peanut butter. Varieties where the oil separates, like Laura Scudder's or Adams,  shouldn't be used.

 

Busy restaurants and cafeterias will love the Peanut Butter Pump!

  • No need to remove a lid or get out the measuring cups to cook. Simply pump and go without any additional utensils and mess.
  • The Peanut Butter Pump also reduces waste by scraping the sides of the jar for you, so you get as much peanut butter as possible. Perfect for a self-service area in a hotel or cafeteria.
  • Each pump is measured for perfect portion control and consistent recipes.
  • Helps keep a kitchen allergy safe by not contaminating different utensils
  • Foodsafe components throughout:
  • Food-grade silicone rubber inner valves
  • Food-grade silicone rubber dispensing valves and caps
  • Food-grade plastic tubes
  • Food-grade stainless-steel spring

 

  • Use the Sandwich Nozzle (aka Ribbon Nozzle) for making a sandwich in your desired thickness
  • Use the Stream Nozzle for recipes
  • Move quickly for regular thickness, or go more slowly for a thicker layer
  • Each pump dispenses a fixed amount, so you can measure accurately every time
  • Measurements are marked on the pump shaft to make food prep a breeze
  • Special valves won’t stick or clog in the open position

​

The Peanut Butter Pump features a Sliding Airlock Mechanism to ensure the perfect pump every time.

Our patent-pending device works by suction, pulling the airlock downward. The mechanism locks out the air, ensuring a good pump all the way to the end of the jar.

All parts are warranted against manufacturing defects. Limited lifetime warranty for all parts under normal household use, excepting the following: Valves and Sliding Airlock may require eventual replacement depending on use.

The Peanut Butter Pump fits most standard 40 oz jars, including the following brands*: Skippy, Jif, Kroger, Great Value (Walmart), Market Pantry (Target), and Kirkland (Costco).

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Andy Scherer, the inventor, lives in Southern California, where they grow almost everything except peanuts. With a former career in financial services, he has discovered that working for peanuts is better than it sounds, and more fun than currency exchange. He is married with 3 children and 2 stepchildren, all grown. He enjoys bicycles, peanut butter cookies and good weather. He is thankful to God; to his supportive family; to America's peanut farmers, shellers and producers; and to the  innovators that gave us the peanut butter we enjoy today, beginning with George Washington Carver and carried forward by the Kellogg Bros., George Bayles and Joseph Rosenfield.

The Peanut Butter Pump was invented in 2017, after the inventor found himself with time on his hands, a love of peanut butter and some very soft bread. When his kids were small and he sent them to school with the traditional PB & J, he often thought that a pump for peanut butter would make his mornings easier, but between their homework and his job, there was no time to tinker with the idea. With the kids mostly grown up, and recently laid off from a corporate job, he decided now was the time.

It was a messy adventure. Sometimes the mess was in the garage, sometimes in the kitchen. But finally, many sandwiches later … Eureka! It worked! Sticky peanut butter and soft bread, together at last, and better than ever.

 

 

 

*These brands are not associated or affiliated with Peanut Butter Ventures in any way, and may change their jars at any time.
story_txt:
Love peanut butter but hate it when your bread rips under your knife?Tired of getting out the knife and scraping the jar?Does peanut butter time always mean a mess, especially with kids?Need exact measurements for consistent baking and recipes? The Peanut Butter Pump is your perfect solution!  
Use on different kinds of nut butters - even crunchy peanut butter!
Many features specifically designed for easy cleaning.
Mechanism scrapes sides of the jar as you use it to get the most peanut butter you can!
   Not only is the Peanut Butter Pump a great way to get the exact amount of peanut butter you need for sandwiches, smoothies, cookies, and hundreds more recipes, without the hassle of cleaning spoons or measuring cups.The Peanut Butter Pump cleans the jar, so you don’t have to! Recycle without rinsing!Once in use, no need to unscrew the lid! Small hands can use the peanut butter pump with ease without making a mess or struggling with a tight jar lid. Getting peanut butter has never been this easy!Need a bunch of snacks in a hurry? Feed hungry kids on the go!Easily assembled and disassembled for simple cleaning and dishwasher safe!   Easy treats for your pet, use it to fill your dog’s toy or to help them enjoy taking their medicine.WARNING: Keep out of reach of dogs. You KNOW how much they love peanut butter and will do anything to get to it! We made the Peanut Butter Pump to work with most 40 ounce containers on the market, so you won’t need to switch brands to use it. Yes! It works on crunchy peanut butter, almond butter, and more. It should only be used for stabilized peanut butter. Varieties where the oil separates, like Laura Scudder's or Adams,  shouldn't be used. Busy restaurants and cafeterias will love the Peanut Butter Pump!
No need to remove a lid or get out the measuring cups to cook. Simply pump and go without any additional utensils and mess.
The Peanut Butter Pump also reduces waste by scraping the sides of the jar for you, so you get as much peanut butter as possible. Perfect for a self-service area in a hotel or cafeteria.
Each pump is measured for perfect portion control and consistent recipes.
Helps keep a kitchen allergy safe by not contaminating different utensils
Foodsafe components throughout:
Food-grade silicone rubber inner valves
Food-grade silicone rubber dispensing valves and caps
Food-grade plastic tubes
Food-grade stainless-steel spring
 
Use the Sandwich Nozzle (aka Ribbon Nozzle) for making a sandwich in your desired thickness
Use the Stream Nozzle for recipes
Move quickly for regular thickness, or go more slowly for a thicker layer
Each pump dispenses a fixed amount, so you can measure accurately every time
Measurements are marked on the pump shaft to make food prep a breeze
Special valves won’t stick or clog in the open position

story:
An alligator that drinks beer? A beer named after some guy named Charles B. Gater? Not quite. But close.

 

 

 

 

 

We all know the woes of renting a keg. It’s all fun and games until you have to drive across town to pick it up, pay way too much in rental fees, lug it to your event, watch your friends and family only drink half of what you paid for, pack it up, and haul it back. We’ve been through it too, and we get it. We knew there had to be cheaper, easier, and dare we say, cooler way. And thus; BeerGater was born.

 

 

The entire BeerGater System weighs in at 8 lbs, making it extremely portable. Whether you’re headed to the big game or to grandma’s house, loading in and packing up your BeerGater is a breeze.

 

While (almost) everyone loves a good brew, beer isn’t the only thing BeerGater can handle. It’s your BeerGater, and what you drink out of it is, quite frankly, none of our business. Just be sure to rinse the system with water after you’re done.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

You’ll be the envy of every tailgating Todd and BBQing Bob. Plus who wouldn’t want to make their friends jealous?

 

We’re really going to drive this point home. Keg rentals can be extremely expensive, especially for serious tailgaters. With BeerGater, not only do you own the tap system, but you can control the amount of beer you truly need in each container, saving you from rental fees and paying for beer no one could finish.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

At the end of the campaign, we will be fully engaged in the manufacturing process. We have already created our first manufacturing run for BeerGater, so ramping up to full production will happen within 60-90 days. This ain’t no prototype product, we already have hundreds in inventory.

 

The funding proceeds will go directly to the immediate manufacture and distribution of new BeerGaters to customers. Since we already own the manufacturing molds and have our suppliers in place, product delivery will be efficient. Our goal is to start delivery to customers as soon as 60 days after the campaign ends.

 

Believe it or not, the idea for BeerGater originally stemmed from the inventor dressing up for a Halloween party as a self-sufficient beer dispensing, walking bartender where guests could pull a cold beer from a tap he was wearing while walking around the party. When he got tired of walking around, he put it on a table where guests could still pull a beer from it - and BeerGater was born. Glorious. But while that costume may have been meant for the night, BeerGater is meant to be with you for the long haul.

For every beach day, every tailgate, every camping trip, and everything in between. BeerGater makes a good time that much better. It’s easier than a keg. It’s cheaper than a keg. It’s sure as hell lighter than a keg. And it’s something you own. Whatever awesome party you’re headed to next, we want BeerGater to make you the life of that party.

story:
You love your family!  You want to keep them safe!  You want to celebrate life and life’s milestones.  The Wishmaker brings additional joy and supreme safety to the act of blowing out candles on your and your loved one’s cake.

With its sleek design, soft whirring sound, ease of use and ability to block 96.79% of harmful germs, bacteria and virus with an FDA approved medical grade filter, the Wishmaker is a must for every occasion that entails blowing out candles.

Simply put it to your lips and blow after you make your wish.

The Wishmaker will give a little push to your dreams and keep everybody safe at the same time.  Afterall, we want to keep everyone healthy and safe; which in itself is a wish come true.

I conceived of the Wishmaker more than 30 years ago by addressing the dirty little secret that we all keep.  Blowing out candles on a cake is GROSS!  I was very sensitive to the design so as not to bring attention to that fact.  Back then, no one wanted to admit the issue.  So we turned a collective blind eye.  I wanted to enhance the wishmaking experience.  Make it more fun and enjoyable and quietly bring safety and efficacy to protecting family, friends and guests.

Well...everybody thought I was a little nuts.  Then 15 years ago I created the new prototype through thorough engineering.  And guess what?  Everybody still thought I was nuts.

Soooo...flash forward to 2020.  I’m not so nuts anymore.I am a father to two adult, and thankfully healthy, daughters.  As a parent, I have always wanted to keep them safe.  And to that extent, my drive has always been to keep as many family's loved ones healthy and safe as well.  I am extremely proud of the team that has helped me refine the Wishmaker to make it affordable, effective and fun.

I named it the Wishmaker and never moved away from that  because I believe that the experience of using the Wishmaker would give a little psychological punctuation to the act of closing your eyes, making your wish, and blowing out your candles.

Website: https://bit.ly/3pBDoY5

Risks and challenges

There are always risks involved in building a business and introducing a new product to the market. The good news is that I have vast experience building successful businesses. That being said, this is the first time I am launching a consumer product and selling directly. I have mitigated much of this by assembling a team of professionals across the spectrum (logistics coordinator, web design, social media organizations, handles on all topical social media platforms, etc..). One risk out of everyone's control at the moment is the cost of raw materials and shipping. If they continue to soar it will be reflected in the cost of the item to the consumer which may impact the total potential purchasers. However, everyone in the world has a birthday from 1-100. So technically there is no specific audience that we would be losing out on. With 350 million people in the US alone, it is a very broad base to draw from.

 

We are seeking to raise $65,000 to finish production and market properly.  I have personally spent more than $35,000 over the past years creating the vision and prototype in addition to setting up a social marketing campaign.

story:
Short Summary

We are award-winning creators of Vegan and Gluten-free cakes.  We started at a market stall in London's Berwick Street and were discovered by the buyers at Wholefoods.  We now have a production unit where we lovingly hand make brownies, cakes, cookies and pies.  Plant-based and gluten-free, we use all natural ingredients: our treats are "clean label".  We have won 4 Great Taste Awards so far.

We have just put the finishing touches on our best creation to date: Vegan and Gluten-free stollen in two flavours which will be packaged in a gift tin for the Holiday Season.  Cranberry, Pistachio & Orange or Chocolate Hazelnut, both with handmade marzipan.

We know this will be an enormous "hit" for us if we are able to properly market it.  It will enable us to grow the business, and make our delicious and great quality "free from" products available to a wider consumer base.

 

What We Need & What You Get

With your support, we will be able to create an exciting PR campaign, put targeted digital advertising in place and work with other like-minded brands to do co-promotions.   We are looking for £5,000 for this marketing activity.

In return, we can offer money off gift tins of stollen for you and friends & family, incredible value gift certificates to the whole range plus subscription boxes every month with the chance to try all of our new products first, and have a say!

If we do not achieve our full target, the funds will do get will still go towards marketing and be very helpful.

The Impact

Our customers are across a wide spectrum, including the ever-growing Vegan population, Coeliacs and others who are looking for quality food using great alternative and healthy ingredients.  Our regular customers come back again and again because of the outstanding quality of what we produce.  Our aim is to maintain this quality and make this high standard more widely available.

Ways You Can Help

We value all kinds of support.  Please do reach out to us if you have any ideas or contacts that might help us spread the word!!

story:
More Flavor

Healthy, flavorful, great with any meal, versatile flavor enhancement, gives brightness and that "extra something" to almost any meal, naturally fermented, vegan, gluten free, and no artificial ingredients. Acid is something all great chefs think about when they cook, so you should too. Sour Humanoid Vinegar uses perfectly paired ingredients to make unique but approachable vinegar that will brighten and add flavor to any meal.

 

Less Pretentious

I worked in restaurants for almost 20 years, and was fortunate enough to work in some very good ones in New York City where I learned about some of the most excellent food and wine in the world. I also came to despise the pretentiousness that came along with it. We all have taste buds, and you don't need PhD-level knowledge to enjoy great food and wine. Everyone eats every day. Your taste buds know what's good.

I quit drinking in 2016 and began using wine that was going to be thrown away (I used to throw it away into my belly) to make vinegar as a hobby. After four years of experimentation and working on my craft I decided to start a company to make flavorful, healthy, interesting, and unpretentious vinegars that are crafted for cooking and versatility. 

I make vinegars that are easy to use and easy to appreciate. The best way to tie together a meal of random ingredients in the fridge instead of going to the store or ordering delivery.

 

Why I'm asking you for help

I cannot sell vinegar from my home to you. It needs to be made in a commercial kitchen using food grade equipment, and it takes weeks or sometimes months to complete a batch, and even longer if I barrel age, but it's worth it.

I'm trying now to get the space to bring three new flavors into the world.  All three are vegan products, but taste great with meat, fish, and poultry as well.

Madeira, Sichuan, Calendula 

Madeira is sweet wine that's been heated and cooled by the sun over and over until it gets it's distinct baked flavor. Combine that with the zip of acid, the floral, citrusy Sichuan peppercorn with it's distinct "zap," and Calendula, a flavor cousin to saffron, and you have a great alternative to Balsamic, but less sweet.

Wild Atlantic Kelp, Rice Wine, Bay Leaf

Sustainable, organic sugar kelp with rice wine and fresh bay leaf are the perfect balance of savory, sweet, sour, and earthy to bring dishes to life with rice, vegetables, soup, poultry, beans, and especially fish.

Barrel-Aged Dulse

Dulse (sustainably harvested and organic) is sometimes substituted for bacon or mushrooms, but the reality is that this seaweed is quite delicious for what it is and doesn't need to be anything it isn't. I use methods I learned from herbal medicine to make a very strong Dulse broth which I then ferment and age in peated oak barrels (like Scotch barrels.) The saline smokiness is sublime.

More Flavors

There are a lot of great flavors that will happen in the future. Your support now means that they'll be available for sale, and not just for dinner at my place. Watermelon-roasted-for-a-month vinegar? Sugar Pumpkin Amizake vinegar? Exotic wine vinegar? If this Indiegogo blows up it'll be a reality.

Fermentation Collective (not empire)

I want the world to ferment more to make food more delicious, but also because fermentation is an easy, healthy way to reduce waste so we can be more sustainable human beings. Your support of a small company will also mean that others will see and follow. 

 

Risks & Challenges

-Scaling up vinegar production is difficult.

-People don't know how to cook with vinegar so a lot of effort will be put into education.

-There's nothing else like Sour Humanoid Vinegar, so people's preconceived notions about what vinegar should taste like are just wrong in this case. The best way to get people to change their mind is for them to try it, and that's hard to do during a pandemic.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Get the word out. Your friends will listen to you. Also, let me know if you like or dislike something and why. Speaking up is the only way to make things better.

story:
In a word, pressure. Coffee machines force water through fresh grounds to maximise extraction. Túbereka forces air through vacuum holes, creating pressure inside, which boosts extraction.

Not only does this brew better coffee, it brews quicker coffee. You can filter the grounds in as little as 90 seconds!

Three pods fit in the base of Túbereka. They provide you with the space to store your favourite beans or grounds. Even better if you drink different styles of coffee throughout the day!

 

Add your grounds and water at the same time and filter in as little as 90 seconds. 

For coffee on the move, use our patent pending 'vacuum release' system - add your coffee, replace the plunger and top up with hot water.

 

You no longer have to wait until your coffee is brewed before starting your journey. The filter and internal pressure prevents the coffee and water from mixing, which restricts extraction. When you're ready for your coffee, raise the plunger to start the brewing process.

Add your ingredients at home

Brew when convenient

 

Add hot water, replace the plunger, screw shut and start your journey. When you're ready for coffee, remove a pod and take out the plunger. Tip the contents in (via a grind if storing beans), replace the plunger and filter in as little as 90 seconds.

 

 

 

A well designed, engineered 'one-piece' filter. Absolutely no mesh, the cause of trapped grounds on traditional filters. A simple rinse of the filter and seal ensures Túbereka is ready for use again.

For a deep clean, the filter is fully detachable. This also allows you to remove the plunger seal. This type of clean is not necessary after each use, but accommodates the removal of residual coffee oils that build up over time.

 

 

 

THANK YOU FOR VIEWING OUR CAMPAIGN

Túbereka forces air through vacuum holes, creating pressure inside, which boosts extraction.Not only does this brew better coffee, it brews quicker coffee. You can filter the grounds in as little as 90 seconds!Three pods fit in the base of Túbereka. They provide you with the space to store your favourite beans or grounds. Even better if you drink different styles of coffee throughout the day! Add your grounds and water at the same time and filter in as little as 90 seconds. For coffee on the move, use our patent pending 'vacuum release' system - add your coffee, replace the plunger and top up with hot water. You no longer have to wait until your coffee is brewed before starting your journey. The filter and internal pressure prevents the coffee and water from mixing, which restricts extraction. When you're ready for your coffee, raise the plunger to start the brewing process.Add your ingredients at homeBrew when convenient Add hot water, replace the plunger, screw shut and start your journey. When you're ready for coffee, remove a pod and take out the plunger. Tip the contents in (via a grind if storing beans), replace the plunger and filter in as little as 90 seconds.   A well designed, engineered 'one-piece' filter. Absolutely no mesh, the cause of trapped grounds on traditional filters. A simple rinse of the filter and seal ensures Túbereka is ready for use again.For a deep clean, the filter is fully detachable. This also allows you to remove the plunger seal. This type of clean is not necessary after each use, but accommodates the removal of residual coffee oils that build up over time.   THANK YOU FOR VIEWING OUR CAMPAIGN

story:
Short Summary

The Dog House.
A bar by the people for the people. A quiet respite from the stress of your 9-to-5. A place to kick back, relax and enjoy the best drinks Aarhus has to offer. 

----

Hi, my name is Julian. You may or may not know me, but if you do you know that where I find myself most at home is behind a bar. I have created this campaign to help me get back where I belong. 

I work hard to create a welcoming atmosphere, and truth be told my bar doesn’t have regulars. It has a family. I hope you’ll join that family. 

There are plenty of loud sports bars, discos and franchised pubs. 

I want to create a friendly and warm place. A place for whisky with your friends. A familiar place for good drinks and better conversations. A place where everyone knows your name. 

The money raised will go towards getting a location and furnishing it. I already have my eye on a spot, and I think the time is ripe to get the ball rolling.

I need your help to raise the money needed to get going, and I hope you will support my campaign. 

Join the Woofers club for 100kr/year in order to receive extra benefits, special events, table reservations and discounts.

After the last year and a half, I think we could all use a quiet drink.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean you can't help:

  • Ask folks to get the word out and make some noise about your campaign

Please note that the perks will be rewarded once the bar is up and running.

story:
Hi and thank you for coming to this site to support my campaign. 

Phase 1 of this campaign has begun with a small goal of $85,000. Once this goal is met, the campaign will be extended to meet the ultimate goal of $325,000.

Thank you for your kind donations and support in advance.

 

 

Short Summary

  • Hi my name is Kennedy L. Morrow Sr and I’m a retired U.S. Army soldier of 25years that happens to love traveling and eating bbq, grilled or smoked turkey leg. Because of this love and observation or problems encountered while eating them, I’ve invented and patented the “Smoked Turkey Leg Case” which will sanitize and revolutionize the way we eat turkey legs.
  • Since I have experienced receiving a turkey leg that was too hot to hold, saw some of the tender meat drop off the bone then on the ground; tried to eat the turkey leg without all the juice or grease getting all over me;  tried to keep the turkey leg safe and free of air born contaminants; having been unable to eat the whole thing in one setting and wishing I had the ability to store the rest to eat later; I wanted to make sure consumers have a better, safe & sanitize way to eat and store smoked turkey legs.
  • By helping me with this campaign and making my “Smoked Turkey Leg Case” available to consumers, we can guarantee that the problems typically encountered while eating hot juicy x-large bar-be-que, grilled or smoked turkey legs are solved.

 

What We Need & What You Get

  • Although I have spent the last seven years personally financing the efforts to design, prototype, test and patent my “Smoked Turkey Leg Case” invention, I will need an estimated $325,000.00 to acquire the injection molds, production contract(s), produce the initial inventory, store it, cover all overhead and operating expense, marketing and selling the product to my waiting and new customers. 
  • As a start-up, I plan to offer the following perks based on my backers contributions: Personalized Smoked Turkey Leg cases (STLCs) from the initial production run, T-shirts w logo, Ball caps w logo, key chains w logo, printed paper and magnet stickers, etc,..
  • All funding will go towards moving my company into the production, marketing & sales phase as listed above should we reach our funding goals or not. 
     

The Impact

  • This project will generate a product that will be used by turkey leg consumers to address the unpleasant issues encountered while eating them. The product will mainly be used to eat, protect, and store turkey legs in. It will also eliminate wasted turkey leg meat, which saves the consumer money and reduce the normal trash generated the current way they are consumed as it’s washable and reusable. The product will also reduce the chances of spreading germs via hands not touching the turkey leg, or other air transported contaminants or viruses from getting on the meat as the case is closed when the smoked turkey leg is not being eaten.
  • Because of the potential positive impact of this patented product for consumers of hot bbq, grilled or smoked turkey legs, I will continue my persistent efforts to make sure it's available for purchase and use by the general public. 
  • Currently I have spent the last 7 – 8 years carefully working on and financing this project myself. I am very proud to have successfully gotten the “Smoked Turkey Leg Case” to where it is now. However, I need your help to get me into production and sales via your contributions and support.
     

Risks & Challenges

  • Since this is the only product of it's kind, there is currently no competition out there. However, I have already taken the initiative to the acquire and publish the respective national and international patents & trademark to protect the product and market it will create to further minimize any risk.

  • Also my 25years of leadership and management background in the US military, the 14 years of experience I have acquired from managing people and supporting various fortune 500 company’s information systems, my circle of friends that are certified chefs, my ability to attract and or recruit other talented people in the food and beverage industry and my vast knowledge with turkey legs makes me very capable of logically addressing and resolving any hurdles that I may encounter. 

  • Last, most of the projected or anticipated challenges surrounding this new product and business have been identified, discussed, addressed and documented in my business planning phase and business plan after having consulted various professionals in their respective fields. However, I plan to continue consulting my legal, logistical, manufacturing, engineering, culinary and or business-related resources where applicable for current solutions to problems arise.

Other Ways You Can Help

  • Whether you were able to donated anything or not, please help me get the word out and make some noise about this new product and campaign.
  • Remember to use the Indiegogo share tools!

Again thanks for all of your time and help.

Kennedy!

Other Ways You Can Help

Whether you were able to donated anything or not, please help me get the word out and make some noise about this new product and campaign.
Remember to use the Indiegogo share tools!

Again thanks for all of your time and help.Kennedy!

story:
Short Summary

Espresso is the start of many great coffees

That's why we believe in the power of really good espresso. We also believe that the coffee market can - and must - be more sustainable and fairer. 

Of course, that starts with the device. Superkop originated from the vision that espresso machines should last longer. That means: no electrical components and only the very best materials. Superkop lasts a lifetime, or even several generations. We do it slightly different. But the essence is that with your Superkop you will be able to make superb espresso.

How it works

​

What We Need & What You Get

We are now ready to bring our Superkop to the world.  Without Indiegogo we will not be able to reach so many people who may be interested. So we are looking for backers, but also interested dealers from all around the world. We promise you an extraordinary innovative machine that will not disappoint you. Prototype is working really well and professional testers are enthusiastic. 

The Impact

When you back us, you help....

  • making the world a bit more sustainable: no waist, no plugs and a life long tool
  • making the world more honest: no hidden commercial models or machine specific add-ons
  • your friends and family who visit you to enjoy an excellent espresso!

Who we are

We are Geert and Sabine, the innovators of Superkop.  

Eight years ago, after another expensive service of our espresso machine, we decided to find a way to make electricity redundant and create a robust but straightforward espresso tool.  Also we didn't like the fact that it takes so long to warm up the machine, and why was that anyway ? We found out it was only because of two things:  1. Heating up the water, and 2. Achieving the right pressure: 9 bar for a good espresso.  Hot water is commodity.  We all make tea, have a hot water tap, or we have another way to get water at the right temperature. 

The challenge was achieving the 9 bars of pressure required for an ideal espresso. We had to find a way to make it easy to do manually.  Then we would be able to make a real espresso without any electricity. After many years of trial and error we have now found the solution! Many testers are already enjoying Superkop. We are proud to tell that even one of the best-known baristas was impressed.

How did we get here

Once we got the idea and decided to find a solution we first studied everything that you possibly can learn about the ideal espresso.  You need 9 to 10 bars, water of 92-96 degrees Celcius, 7 grams ground beans for 30 ml espresso.

There were no secrets left after reading many books and online studies. We tried all products that had manual power instead of electricity. But nothing came close to our ideal espresso maker.

To make it a lively project we thought about the look and feel, and created a mood-board for that.

It was obviously that whatever the outcome would be it would be well and functionally designed, It should be a robust tool and be in the spirit of a Zippo, Leatherman, Opinel or another ever lasting brand that really serves its function.  The first name was Green Presso. Much later we changed that to Superkop. We made, tried and changed many prototypes, below one of them.

Risks & Challenges

We now have already created tooling and production lines which have been tested. We are now in the final stage of creating the mass production tooling. We have mapped out the critical path and have made all necessary precautions to ensure we can scale production if we achieve our goal.  We are very confident in our timeline, but it's our core belief to never settle for a mediocre product, so we won't be compromising on quality in order to save time. Should any issues arise we promise to keep you updated every step of the way and deliver you the best quality product as soon as possible.   

Other Ways You Can Help

Pre-ordering our Superkop would be great, but if you can help us in another way is also very welcome: Sharing this project with friends, being or knowing a potential reseller, having ideas or tips about our project.

story:
❤️❤️❤️ with the support of www.lordinario.it

 ⬇️  in Italiano |  по русски ⬇️

------------------------------------------------------

The pleasure of food is the heart of the project. In Italy, food is not just work and survival, but a real religion, a cult that unites and makes local communities grow. In recent years, a rediscovery of original and authentic flavors has been developing in Russia, those that could only be found in homes. We try to get out of the logic of factory production with the same and planned tastes, we look for local recipes, the culture of the place and rediscover traditions that have always been preserved in the country houses.

We will look for small local producers, farms, family businesses, enthusiasts who through food and traditional recipes want to rediscover the local culture and traditions that allow the life and growth of the community itself through sustainable and ecological tourism.

 

HOW

For a month (August 2021) we will travel in Russian territory not using airplanes, but only ground vehicles. Especially the train. We will travel from Europe to Asia arriving at the Pacific Ocean: Vladivostok. The concept of travel and discovery must be slow, human, constant, pleasant. The pleasure of food and conviviality leads to the discovery of human relationships, the slowness of production, the quality of ingredients and the conservation of the territory. Only from a clean, non-polluted, not over-exploited environment can quality products be born. We will discover how people are closely connected to local cultures, their environment and their community.

 

------------------------------------------------------

 

Удовольствие от еды - это сердце проекта. В Италии еда – это не только для работы и выживания, а настоящая религия, культ, который объединяет людей и способствует росту местных сообществ. В последние годы в России происходит новое открытие оригинальных и аутентичных традиций в еде, которые можно было найти только в домашних условиях. Мы стараемся выйти из логики фабричного производства с одинаковыми и запланированными вкусами, мы ищем местные рецепты, культуру места и заново открываем для себя традиции, которые всегда сохранялись в деревнях.Мы будем искать небольших местных производителей, фермы, семейные предприятия, энтузиастов, которые с помощью еды и традиционных рецептов хотят заново открыть для себя местную культуру и традиции, которые позволяют жить и расти самому сообществу посредством устойчивого и экологического туризма.

 

Как мы будем это реализовывать

В течение месяца (август 2021 года) мы будем путешествовать по территории России ( из Москвы до Владивостока) не на самолетах, а только наземным транспортом, во многом поездом, следуя по Транссибирской магистрали. Мы планируем путешествие из Европы в Азию, прибывая к Тихому океану: Владивосток. Идея путешествия и открытий должны быть медленными, человечными, постоянными и приятными. Удовольствие от еды и праздничное настроение приводят к открытию человеческих взаимоотношений, медленности производства, качеству ингредиентов и сохранению территории. Только из чистой, незагрязненной, не подвергающейся чрезмерной эксплуатации окружающей среды могут родиться качественные продукты. Мы узнаем, как люди тесно связаны с местными культурами, своим окружением и своим сообществом.

 

------------------------------------------------------

 

Il piacere del cibo è il cuore del progetto. In italia il cibo non è solo lavoro e sopravvivenza, ma una vera e propria religione, un culto che unisce e fa crescere le comunità locali. Negli ultimi anni si sta sviluppando in Russia una riscoperta dei sapori tradizionali e autentici, quelli che si trovavano solo nelle case. Si cerca di uscire dalla logica della produzione di fabbrica con i gusti uguali e pianificati. Cercheremo le ricette locali, la cultura del luogo e si riscoprono tradizioni che da sempre si conservano nelle case di campagna.

Cercheremo piccoli produttori locali, aziende agricole, aziende famigliari, appassionati che attraverso il cibo e le ricette tradizionali vogliano riscoprire la cultura e le tradizioni locali che permettono la vita e la crescita della comunità stessa attraverso un turismo sostenibile ed ecologico.

 

Modalità

Per un mese (agosto 2021) viaggeremo da Mosca a Vladivostok nel territorio russo non usando aerei, ma solo mezzi di terra. Soprattutto treno seguendo la linea transiberiana. Viaggeremo dall’Europa all’Asia arrivando all’oceano Pacifico. Il concetto di viaggio e scoperta deve essere lento, umano, costante, piacevole. Il piacere del cibo e della convivialità riporta alla scoperta dei rapporti umani, della lentezza della produzione, della qualità degli ingredienti e della conservazione del territorio. Solo da un ambiente pulito, non inquinato, non iper sfruttato possono nascere prodotti di qualità. Scopriremo come le persone sono strettamente collegate alle culture locali, al loro ambiente e alla loro comunità.

Мы планируем путешествие из Европы в Азию, прибывая к Тихому океану: Владивосток. Идея путешествия и открытий должны быть медленными, человечными, постоянными и приятными. Удовольствие от еды и праздничное настроение приводят к открытию человеческих взаимоотношений, медленности производства, качеству ингредиентов и сохранению территории. Только из чистой, незагрязненной, не подвергающейся чрезмерной эксплуатации окружающей среды могут родиться качественные продукты. Мы узнаем, как люди тесно связаны с местными культурами, своим окружением и своим сообществом. ------------------------------------------------------ Il piacere del cibo è il cuore del progetto. In italia il cibo non è solo lavoro e sopravvivenza, ma una vera e propria religione, un culto che unisce e fa crescere le comunità locali. Negli ultimi anni si sta sviluppando in Russia una riscoperta dei sapori tradizionali e autentici, quelli che si trovavano solo nelle case. Si cerca di uscire dalla logica della produzione di fabbrica con i gusti uguali e pianificati. Cercheremo le ricette locali, la cultura del luogo e si riscoprono tradizioni che da sempre si conservano nelle case di campagna.Cercheremo piccoli produttori locali, aziende agricole, aziende famigliari, appassionati che attraverso il cibo e le ricette tradizionali vogliano riscoprire la cultura e le tradizioni locali che permettono la vita e la crescita della comunità stessa attraverso un turismo sostenibile ed ecologico. ModalitàPer un mese (agosto 2021) viaggeremo da Mosca a Vladivostok nel territorio russo non usando aerei, ma solo mezzi di terra. Soprattutto treno seguendo la linea transiberiana. Viaggeremo dall’Europa all’Asia arrivando all’oceano Pacifico. Il concetto di viaggio e scoperta deve essere lento, umano, costante, piacevole. Il piacere del cibo e della convivialità riporta alla scoperta dei rapporti umani, della lentezza della produzione, della qualità degli ingredienti e della conservazione del territorio. Solo da un ambiente pulito, non inquinato, non iper sfruttato possono nascere prodotti di qualità. Scopriremo come le persone sono strettamente collegate alle culture locali, al loro ambiente e alla loro comunità.

story:
JOEPRESSO™ is an attachment for your AeroPress® and AeroPress® Go that transforms your AeroPress® into a true espresso maker. You don't need to spend hundreds on a clunky espresso machine that wastes space and forces you into buying coffee pods that don't taste the way you like.

How to Use Joepresso™

Review

Interview - Most Questions Answered Here

https://youtu.be/bdUekQ9AOoM

Experiments

 

How's JOEPRESSO™ different from AeroPress®? 

An espresso machine and JOEPRESSO™ forces hot water through a layer of coffee grinds stripping them of dissolvable solids and oils in a method called pressurized percolation. In contrast, in an immersion brewer such as the AeroPress® you mix the coffee with water in the chamber and let it steep before pressing the coffee out through a paper filter.

JOEPRESSO™ uses a classic stainless steel pressurized filter basket found on many espresso machines to transform the AeroPress® from an immersion brewer to a percolation brewer. Using the same coffee to water ratios we have found that JOEPRESSO™ produces a richer espresso with higher levels of TDS - Total Dissolved Solids. JOEPRESSO™ also produces crema, which is a sign of a good fresh espresso.

How Is JOEPRESSO™ different from a Moka Pot?

Like a Moka Pot, Joepresso forces hot water through a layer of coffee grinds. However, Joepresso offers much more control. As you can adjust the coffee volume, water volume, the water temperature and the rate at which the water is forced through the coffee grinds. Generally, you will be able to make a faster espresso with a JOEPRESSO™ and therefore avoid the drink becoming over-extracted and bitter.

Use it for Espresso, Americano, Cappuccino, Latte and More

When you need a coffee that will cut through the milk, JOEPRESSO™ is a simple solution that works. Not only will you be able to make great tasting espresso, but all other espresso-based drinks. Though it takes a bit of effort, you can froth milk using the JOEPRESSO™.

Why Indiegogo

We are happy to have reached our target for producing the JOEPRESSO™ and as of now, we've started shipping the rewards. However,  many of you have missed the deadline on Kickstarter and some want to upgrade the perks, so we've decided to continue offering pre-orders here. You can order your JOEPRESSO now and we will ship within one workweek. You don't need to wait for us to set up a website, start working with a fulfilment center and set up a distribution channel in your country if you are outside of USA. 

The Impact

JOEPRESSO was created out of necessity. It allowed us to make real espresso at home or anywhere with just an AeroPress®. Moreover, it makes foam for latte and cappuccino.

There are no additional paper filters to buy ever and with stainless steel parts, it will last for many years to come.

story:
OUR VISION

We are on a mission to heal the world with nutritious and tasty plant based foods.

OUR BELIEFS

Food Can Heal You From Within

On-Demand Can Be Eco-Friendly

Power Food Has Incredible Potential

Ancient Wisdom Is Best Served In Modern Solutions

Short Summary

We created VitaBites after discovering that very few snacks on the market actually contain truly pure ingredients. Most contain sugars, oils, preservatives, unhealthy fats, or are heavily processed. Our nutritionist-designed bites use monk fruit sweetener, which does not elevate blood sugar or insulin, making it an ideal snack for blood sugar and weight management.

VitaBites are suitable for individuals with a variety of health conditions including diabetes, heart disease, hypertension, and high cholesterol. Our monk fruit sweetener is also Autism Approved by the Autism Hope Alliance.

 

 

 

 

100% Biodegradable Plant-based Packaging

Custom packaging that is functional, safe for the environment, and represents the VitaBites brand.

  • Made out of 100% plant fiber
  • Custom design by HatchDuo (creators of the Sonos System)
  • Manufactured by UBest Packaging

 

 

 

 

 

 

*These statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease.

story:
Short Summary

Alien Octane® Sports Iced Teas is company brewed in the classic entrepreneurial tradition. At The 2018 Musical of Hip Hop High -Musical® Producer Z-Man celebrated with the cast and crew and toasted over a bottle of soda, The cast insisted on having an alternative drink so we bought instant Ice tea and created different flavors by using different flavors of Iced Teas & Sports drinks; from there the Sports Iced Tea was born and so was Alien Octane® Sports Iced Teas

Lunar Landing is Iced teas mixed with Cranberry , Lemon and Lime and will be just one of the Flavors Out of this World from Alien Octane® Sports Iced Teas

 

What We Need & What You Get

Alien Octane® Sports Iced Teas Bottled tea will tastes like tea, but refreshes like a sport drink, that's what we are going for. Somewhere between the pumped-up, sugar-saturated drinks and the tasteless waters, there is a need for a healthier beverage which provides genuine natural taste without the artificially concocted sweeteners and preservatives designed to compensate for lack of taste. Alien Octane® Sports Iced Teas allows people to enjoy the world’s second most popular drink as a sports drink or a casual beverage. A Tea that tastes like tea -- A world of flavor freshly brewed and barely sweetened.

Call it a Futuristic taste or call it forward thinking; Alien Octane® Sports Iced Teas is something totally different with Flavors Out of The World; Alien Octane® Sports Iced Teas will truly be something NEW!!

What we need is to create three prototype flavors that we can distribute to stores on the East Coast; your funding will help us to create our intial three flavors; Saturn Rings - Ice Tea with  Peach, Cantelope & Cherry, Neptune- Iced Tea with  Kiwi , Grape & Watermelon and Lunar Landing -Iced Tea, Lime , Lemon & Cranberry. This is just a start of our trademarked Out of this world flavors which will expand as the company grows. 

The Impact

Unlike most of the bottled teas in the marketplace, Alien Octane® Sports Iced Teas will not made with bricks of tea dust, tea concentrate, or other artificial sweeteners or acids. The tea will have no bitter after taste or sugar kick, and will not leave a syrupy film on the drinker’s teeth. Alien Octane® Sports Iced Teas will have three other benefits which enhance its acceptance and marketability:

Alien Octane® Sports Iced Teas will be on the leading edge of marketing. The motosports world will be engulfed with Alien Octane® Sports Iced Teas. Like Red Bull and Monster; Alien Octane holds a bold look for the motorsports world. Motocross riders are starting to reach for healthier choices and moms of the younger riders are starting to look for those choices as well. Unlike Red Bull and Monster; Alien Octane® Sports Iced Tea is a soft drink with less sugars and natural flavors is an invited refreshing change from high caffiene energy that comes with warnings.

 

With your help Alien Octane™ Sports Iced Teas​ can make an immediate splash onto the Iced Tea Soft Drink market

Low in calories: A 12-ounce serving of Alien Octane® Sports Iced Teas will only have 17 calories, dramatically less than other bottled teas or comparable beverages. We have found that the low-calorie profile of Alien Octane® Sports Iced Teas will make the drink attractive to our core customer

Health benefits of brewed tea: The curative properties of tea have been known for thousands of years. Because Alien Octane® Sports Iced Teas will be brewed from genuine tea leaves it imparts many health benefits not found in tea-flavored drinks. In addition to serving as a digestive aid, tea has powerful antioxidants, which impair the development of free radicals which contribute to cancer and heart disease

Benefits of  a Sports Drink: Each Alien Octane® Sports Iced Teas flavor has all of the benefits of drinking a sports drink that has enhanced electrolytes to replenish your thirst and bold out of this world flavors

Alien Octane® Sports Iced Teas will have all Natural fruit flovors like , Kiwi, Peach, Banana and Grape

 

Risks & Challenges

Since tea is the world’s second most popular beverage, there is an intrinsic international appeal Alien Octane® Sports Iced Teas new world of flavor freshly brewed and lightly sweetened. Although our primary energies are directed toward the US market, we will focus will the help of our Alien Octane® Sports Iced Teas spokespeople to capture  an extensive international market They will be lauching our product on the east coast of the United States as well showing our product in the UK early next year with the intent to sell the bottled tea in the Fall of 2022

Product Development and Future Products. In 2022 we will be introducing at least two new flavors in direct response to feedback from our customers and will continue to release new flavors as the brand grows

Alien Octane® Sports Iced Teas will travel all over the Galaxy to bring you Flavors Out of this World®; like Saturn Rings - Ice Tea with  Peach, Cantelope & Cherry, Neptune- Iced Tea with  Kiwi , Grape & Watermelon and Lunar Landing -Iced Tea, Lime , Lemon & Cranberry

Other Ways You Can Help

We recognize that because we are not as well-financed or as well-established as much of our competition, whenever we play by their marketing rules, we are at a disadvantage. Therefore, instead of spending a lot of money on advertising, Alien Octane® Sports Iced Teas relies instead on opportunistic ways to gain public attention and promote trial of the product.

Alien Octane® Sports Iced Teas will travel all over the Galaxy to bring you Flavors Out of this World®; like Saturn Rings - Ice Tea with  Peach, Cantelope & Cherry, Neptune- Iced Tea with  Kiwi , Grape & Watermelon and Lunar Landing -Iced Tea, Lime , Lemon & Cranberry


Other Ways You Can Help
We recognize that because we are not as well-financed or as well-established as much of our competition, whenever we play by their marketing rules, we are at a disadvantage. Therefore, instead of spending a lot of money on advertising, Alien Octane® Sports Iced Teas relies instead on opportunistic ways to gain public attention and promote trial of the product.

story:
Bringing Happiness to the World with "Omurice"

With a vision of "Bringing Happiness to the World with "Omurice" "The Western Restaurant Kichi Kichi," a famous restaurant in Kyoto, Japan that has been in business for over 30 years, has developed a frying pan specifically for Omurice!

Professional Omurice chef has been working on the concept for years.

 "The Western-style restaurant Kichi Kichi", which is producing a special frying pan for Omurice this time, is a long-established restaurant in 1978 in Kyoto, Japan.
The 65years old owner chef Motokichi Yukimura has over 260,000 registered users on his Youtube channel, and is known as "The Western-style restaurant where you can't get a reservation" by overseas travelers.
 He is said to be an entertainer, and his brilliant fryingpan skills and light-hearted talk are worth watching.
To eat an omelet made by the chef, you need to make a reservation days in advance, and you also need to go to Japan.
But with this frying pan, you can recreate the chef's Omurice at home.
It also comes with a special turner and rice cup.

To enjoy Kichi Kichi 's Omurice at home.

Due to COVID-19, Omurice fans and overseas travelers living in Japan can no longer come to eat Omurice from Kichi Kichi.
In order to make it possible for them to enjoy Omurice at home, we held a crowdfunding campaign in Japan and Taiwan for a special flyingpan for Omurice that we had been developing for a long time.
In total, we received over $210,000 in support!

Do you know what an 'Omurice' is?

The word “Omurice" is a Japanese word combining "omelet" and "rice" and is a dish unique to Japan.
The omelet is made by placing a creamy egg before it is fully cooked on top of fried rice with chicken and onions, and is served with tomato, demi-glace, creamy mushroom, or other sauces, and can be topped with cheese.

Following the popular Japanese foods of sushi and ramen, Omurice has the potential to become a global boom.

The most famous omelet in Japan is the Kichi Kichi's Omurice.It has been highly praised by the American food media "delish".

Many videos of the "Kichi Kichi" chef making Omurice have been uploaded to video sharing sites, and some of them have been viewed over 10 million times.

Making a beautiful omelet is difficult.

"It was going so well, but when I turned it over, it fell apart..."
It is very difficult to reproduce the taste, texture, and ideal shape of a restaurant in a home frying pan.
However, with this pan, you can easily make the same omelet as in a high class restaurant!

Calculated shapes that are easy to make and beautiful to finish

Large frying pans make it difficult to put together an omelet because the eggs spread out too much, but this pan is designed for one serving, so you can make an omelet for omelet rice with the perfect size.

■Non-stick design
The bottom of the frying pan is made thicker on purpose.
The bottom of the pan is made thicker on purpose, because if it is too thin, it will burn easily.
It is also coated with fluorine, making it non-stick and very easy to wash.

■Sloped bottom surface

The most difficult part is to roll the omelet.
The bottom of the pan is sloped to avoid mistakes in this process.It took us more than a year to determine and develop the 0.8° angle shown in 'SectionB'.
I have found that the slope makes it easier to roll the omelet.

Furthermore, in pursuit of a beautiful finish and effortless turning over rounder than most pans. The long handle makes moving the eggs very smooth.

Easy Omelet Recipe

 

1) Heat a small amount of butter.
2) Heat two or three beaten eggs.
3) Stir quickly to heat through evenly.
4) When the eggs are half-boiled, turn the omelet over with a special turner, holding it from the tip of the pan.
5)After shaping the omelet with the turner, place it on top of the rice.
6) Make a slit in the middle of the omelet with a knife.
7)Serve with your favorite sauce and you are done!

 

Excellent durability and ease of handling

The frying pan is made of aluminum, which has superior heat conductivity compared to stainless steel or iron, and the surface is coated with fluorine.
The frying pan has actually been used more than 2,000 times in the kitchen of "The Western Restaurant Kichi Kichi" without burning.
This is a product that can be used for a long time.
After use, simply wash and dry, so it is easy to clean.

【Size】Total length including handle: 15.35in/39cm
【Weight】 520g /1.15lbs
【Material】Body: Aluminum Surface (fluorine coated) Handle: Silicon rubber

 

Use a special turner to ensure no flipping mistakes.

When flipping an omelet, you can use a special turner to get a professional look without destroying the egg.
It is made of silicone and when you slide it between the pan and the omelet, the slit in the center fits the edge of the pan and the egg, allowing you to flip the omelet without damaging it.
The tip is thin for easy scooping, and it is unique in that it finishes beautifully without tearing.

【Size】115mm x 265mm/4.52in x 10.43in
【Weight】 72g/0.15lbs
【Material】Resin, Silicon

 

Important item for serving beautifully.


Chicken rice can be served in a dome shape. The design of the Omurice is cute.

 

【Regular size】 215cc

80mm(H) x 140mm (W) x 65mm (H)

3.1in(H) x 5.5in (W) x 2.5in (H)

【Small size】130cc

63mm (H) x 125mm (W) x 60mm (H)

2.4in (H) x 4.9in (W) x 2.3in (H)
Material: Resin


Omelet Pan 1st Model Added!

Many of you have requested that we make the 1st model omelet pan available for purchase.
After consulting with the manufacturing plant, we are now able to purchase a limited number of them.
This model is a gas-only omelet pan.
※Please note that it cannot be used with other heat sources such as injection heaters.

Mr. Motokichi Yukimura confidently shares his thoughts on the development of the initial model and its features.

 

Professional craftsman and a long-established Omurice maker team up.

Arnest Corporation, located in the manufacturing town of Tsubame-Sanjo in Niigata Prefecture, has developed a frying pan specifically for omelet.
It is known as one of Japan's top metal processing centers for cutlery and cooking utensils, and produces many metal products that are widely used by both professionals and households around the world.
The products are made in Japan with safety and reliability.

This project started when Kichikichi's owner chef approached Ernest's Senior Managing Director Suzuki when he was looking for companies to jointly develop frying pans on the restaurant's website.
After that, he came to Arnest headquarters, and through a series of detailed discussions and incorporating his particular tastes, we were able to complete a frying pan that could reproduce the taste and shape of Kichi Kichi Owner Chef's wonderful omelet rice.
We hope you will enjoy the professional level omelet rice at home, referring to the fun performance that can be seen on Youtube.

Schedule

Risks & Challenges

  • The designs, colors and specifications are subject to change.
  • The shipping time may be delayed depending on the order status, the supply status of the materials, and the manufacturing process. 
  • Due to COVID-19, the production of the Omurice flyingpan may take longer than our manufacturing schedule.
  • We ask for your understanding in this matter. COVID-19 is affecting delivery and transportation speed, so please keep in mind that the delivery of the  Flat edge Bowl  may be delayed.
  • If we are successful and the project is funded, we will not be able to offer refunds.
  • Any import taxes and fees will be paid for by the backer.
story_txt:
Bringing Happiness to the World with "Omurice"With a vision of "Bringing Happiness to the World with "Omurice" "The Western Restaurant Kichi Kichi," a famous restaurant in Kyoto, Japan that has been in business for over 30 years, has developed a frying pan specifically for Omurice!Professional Omurice chef has been working on the concept for years. "The Western-style restaurant Kichi Kichi", which is producing a special frying pan for Omurice this time, is a long-established restaurant in 1978 in Kyoto, Japan.The 65years old owner chef Motokichi Yukimura has over 260,000 registered users on his Youtube channel, and is known as "The Western-style restaurant where you can't get a reservation" by overseas travelers. He is said to be an entertainer, and his brilliant fryingpan skills and light-hearted talk are worth watching.To eat an omelet made by the chef, you need to make a reservation days in advance, and you also need to go to Japan.But with this frying pan, you can recreate the chef's Omurice at home.It also comes with a special turner and rice cup.To enjoy Kichi Kichi 's Omurice at home.Due to COVID-19, Omurice fans and overseas travelers living in Japan can no longer come to eat Omurice from Kichi Kichi.In order to make it possible for them to enjoy Omurice at home, we held a crowdfunding campaign in Japan and Taiwan for a special flyingpan for Omurice that we had been developing for a long time.In total, we received over $210,000 in support!Do you know what an 'Omurice' is?The word “Omurice" is a Japanese word combining "omelet" and "rice" and is a dish unique to Japan.The omelet is made by placing a creamy egg before it is fully cooked on top of fried rice with chicken and onions, and is served with tomato, demi-glace, creamy mushroom, or other sauces, and can be topped with cheese.Following the popular Japanese foods of sushi and ramen, Omurice has the potential to become a global boom.The most famous omelet in Japan is the Kichi Kichi's Omurice.It has been highly praised by the American food media "delish".Many videos of the "Kichi Kichi" chef making Omurice have been uploaded to video sharing sites, and some of them have been viewed over 10 million times.Making a beautiful omelet is difficult."It was going so well, but when I turned it over, it fell apart..."It is very difficult to reproduce the taste, texture, and ideal shape of a restaurant in a home frying pan.However, with this pan, you can easily make the same omelet as in a high class restaurant!Calculated shapes that are easy to make and beautiful to finishLarge frying pans make it difficult to put together an omelet because the eggs spread out too much, but this pan is designed for one serving, so you can make an omelet for omelet rice with the perfect size.■Non-stick designThe bottom of the frying pan is made thicker on purpose.The bottom of the pan is made thicker on purpose, because if it is too thin, it will burn easily.It is also coated with fluorine, making it non-stick and very easy to wash.■Sloped bottom surfaceThe most difficult part is to roll the omelet.The bottom of the pan is sloped to avoid mistakes in this process.It took us more than a year to determine and develop the 0.8° angle shown in 'SectionB'.I have found that the slope makes it easier to roll the omelet.Furthermore, in pursuit of a beautiful finish and effortless turning over rounder than most pans. The long handle makes moving the eggs very smooth.Easy Omelet Recipe 1) Heat a small amount of butter.2) Heat two or three beaten eggs.3) Stir quickly to heat through evenly.4) When the eggs are half-boiled, turn the omelet over with a special turner, holding it from the tip of the pan.5)After shaping the omelet with the turner, place it on top of the rice.6) Make a slit in the middle of the omelet with a knife.7)Serve with your favorite sauce and you are done! Excellent durability and ease of handlingThe frying pan is made of aluminum, which has superior heat conductivity compared to stainless steel or iron, and the surface is coated with fluorine.The frying pan has actually been used more than 2,000 times in the kitchen of "The Western Restaurant Kichi Kichi" without burning.This is a product that can be used for a long time.After use, simply wash and dry, so it is easy to clean.【Size】Total length including handle: 15.35in/39cm【Weight】 520g /1.15lbs【Material】Body: Aluminum Surface (fluorine coated) Handle: Silicon rubber Use a special turner to ensure no flipping mistakes.When flipping an omelet, you can use a special turner to get a professional look without destroying the egg.It is made of silicone and when you slide it between the pan and the omelet, the slit in the center fits the edge of the pan and the egg, allowing you to flip the omelet without damaging it.The tip is thin for easy scooping, and it is unique in that it finishes beautifully without tearing.【Size】115mm x 265mm/4.52in x 10.43in【Weight】 72g/0.15lbs【Material】Resin, Silicon Important item for serving beautifully.Chicken rice can be served in a dome shape. The design of the Omurice is cute. 【Regular size】 215cc80mm(H) x 140mm (W) x 65mm (H)3.1in(H) x 5.5in (W) x 2.5in (H)【Small size】130cc63mm (H) x 125mm (W) x 60mm (H)2.4in (H) x 4.9in (W) x 2.3in (H)Material: ResinOmelet Pan 1st Model Added!Many of you have requested that we make the 1st model omelet pan available for purchase.After consulting with the manufacturing plant, we are now able to purchase a limited number of them.This model is a gas-only omelet pan.※Please note that it cannot be used with other heat sources such as injection heaters.Mr. Motokichi Yukimura confidently shares his thoughts on the development of the initial model and its features. Professional craftsman and a long-established Omurice maker team up.Arnest Corporation, located in the manufacturing town of Tsubame-Sanjo in Niigata Prefecture, has developed a frying pan specifically for omelet.It is known as one of Japan's top metal processing centers for cutlery and cooking utensils, and produces many metal products that are widely used by both professionals and households around the world.The products are made in Japan with safety and reliability.This project started when Kichikichi's owner chef approached Ernest's Senior Managing Director Suzuki when he was looking for companies to jointly develop frying pans on the restaurant's website.After that, he came to Arnest headquarters, and through a series of detailed discussions and incorporating his particular tastes, we were able to complete a frying pan that could reproduce the taste and shape of Kichi Kichi Owner Chef's wonderful omelet rice.We hope you will enjoy the professional level omelet rice at home, referring to the fun performance that can be seen on Youtube.ScheduleRisks & Challenges
The designs, colors and specifications are subject to change.
The shipping time may be delayed depending on the order status, the supply status of the materials, and the manufacturing process. 
Due to COVID-19, the production of the Omurice flyingpan may take longer than our manufacturing schedule.
We ask for your understanding in this matter. COVID-19 is affecting delivery and transportation speed, so please keep in mind that the delivery of the  Flat edge Bowl  may be delayed.
If we are successful and the project is funded, we will not be able to offer refunds.
Any import taxes and fees will be paid for by the backer.

story:
Introduction

Welcome to the OPERATION: THIRD'S BBQ FOOD TRAILER Fundraising Campaign!
We have been working hard for the past 8 years to bring the Third's BBQ brand to fruition. 
This journey began with us cooking for our kid's birthday parties and has evolved to catering and dinner services in just a few years. 

In the sections below, you'll be able to hear about our experience, the campaign outline, and the vision for Third's BBQ and what that means for you as a supporter of this vision and dream of the Third's BBQ food trailer. 
 

 

What We Need & What You Get [PERKS Y'ALL!!!]

In this video, we talk about some of the different types of equipment that we need in order to produce the best BBQ that Palm Beach County has yet to experience.

 

The Impact

We aren't just doing this for us...we're doing this for Palm Beach County. We truly seek to give back to our local communities by periodically partnering with local non-profit organizations in order to help provide meals for those in need. This is bigger than us. 

 

Risks & Challenges

After giving this issue much thought...we came to the decision that "MONEY" is really our biggest challenge. As for risks, every venture involves a certain level of risk. We have been striving for this for some years now and have added to our previous knowledge of the food service industry AND management of a food service operation. At this point, it's all about bringing Third's BBQ to the masses of Palm Beach County.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Another huge way you can help us out is to just simply SHARE this campaign on your social media channels - Facebook, LinkedIn, Instagram, etc. 
It could be the person that sees your post that could be a major donor for Operation: Third's BBQ food trailer.


THANKS FOR ROCKIN' WITH US!!!!!

story:
Keto Kind

 

Hi there! We are Mauricio and Andres, two young scientists and the best of friends. Like many of you, we’ve passionately searched for the balance between a savory diet and one that is optimal for you. After countless hours combing through the literature and talking to experts in the field, it became clear that a low-carb, and especially a Ketogenic diet can work wonders for one’s well-being. Following our own personal struggles adhering to the diet, we decided to create Keto Kind, a plant-based, ready-to-drink ketogenic shake meeting the highest of standards, to help us, and you along the way.

 

Let's break it down

Made from organic ingredients:

 

Keto Kind is designed to help you reach and maintain a state of ketosis. We have created this product to make keto accessible and easy to adhere to.  

Keto Kind's calories come mostly from fats and there is no need for iffy net carb calculations. The shakes have just 3g total carbs and are full of healthy monounsaturated fats, with a spoonful of MCT's to provide lasting energy.

To us, Keto Kind tastes best cold (and after it is appropriately shaked), but don't only take it from us. Let's see what early adopters are saying: 

 

Making keto simple

We’ve probably all heard that eating sugar or processed foods is not ideal. And while that is most likely true, actually doing so, is not easy (just ask us about it). Saying “no” to a melted-cheese, crunchy pizza or a freshly baked brownie requires everything we’ve got.  When you add the constraints of a busy schedule, or yearnings after a long day, we tend to go for what’s convenient and will satisfy our cravings, which is not always the healthy choice.

At the same time, when we take a few too many of these decisions and compound them over time, our bodies tend to wear down and that can lead to chronic conditions.

 

As Travis Christofferson, author of "Ketones, the Fourth Fuel" and one of our scientific advisors describes:

(If you want to dive deeper and watch Travis’ full 4-min explanatory video, you can click on this link)

 

Realizing how widespread this problem is, it was clear that a product that was accessible and well-formulated had to be created. To do so successfully, we partnered with some of the industry-leading scientists, clinicians, and nutritionists. The result is Keto Kind.

With your support, we will be able to do our first commercial production run and start delivering to everyone who wants to take control of their health. We want to thank you in advance and welcome you to the Keto Kind family.

 

Rewards 

 

Who we are

 

Our path 

 

 

Learn more

Subscribe to our newsletter on our website to get exclusive offers and our curated science deep dives to get you geared up for your keto journey.

 

Risks and Challenges

As with any startup there are inherent risks when launching. We have been careful with our planning and supply chain management and are currently ready to produce. Nevertheless, considering this is our first commercial batch of Keto Kind shakes, something unforeseen could come up (even if that is unlikely at the time).

We anticipate no setbacks in delivering the first orders, but if the demand for Keto Kind highly exceeds our projection, there could be some challenges on the delivery front. Similarly, the supply chain world has experienced delays in recent months (due to Covid-19) so the production of a 2nd batch to meet demand could take longer than anticipated. However, rest assured that we are preparing for this in advance and will do everything in our power to get Keto Kind in your hands.
