story:
Fresh, Healthy, Delicious  ​

Come home to meals ready, an All-in-one smart cooking appliance for fresh, healthier restaurant-quality meals intelligently cooked during your busy day. Put a chef in your pocket, with Figo, vacuum seal, cool, and cook food automatically with your phone. Figo not only enhances the quality of your meal but also elevates your health!

 

See how easy Figo makes cooking  

 

Get better results with Figo cooking 

Steak cooked with Figo is perfect, from edge-to-edge with a tasty light crust. Unlike traditional cooking methods, shown on the left, sous vide cooking yields larger & flavorful results as meat isn’t dried out. 

Perfectly cooked eggs are a challenge for chefs at any level. Figo allows you to control exactly how the eggs turn out. Traditional cooking tends to create overcooked edges. 

 

Like steaks, salmon made with Figo is perfectly cooked from edge-to-edge, whereas traditional pan-searing or oven methods tend to shrink the meat and overcook the edge. 

 

Figo in the news

Flawless Meals in 3 Easy Steps

 

Figo makes cooking easy

Once limited to the pros, sous vide cooking gets you consistent and tasty results every time, even if you've never cooked before.

Sous vide is an easy, hands-free way to cook great food that will wow your guests. It's all about bringing your food to an exact temperature and holding it until you get a perfect result. Sous vide style cooking means:

  • Healthier and Tastier Cooking  — Use fewer oils by letting food cook in its juices and retain more nutrients with low-temperature cooking.
  • Consistent Results — Food is always cooked to a precise temperature for a specific amount of time that can be easily repeated.
  • Never Overcook Again — By slowly reaching the temperatures you set, your food won’t ever overcook. 
  • Easy Cleanup — Simply wash your reusable bag and jars or recycle plastic bags after cooking. 
  • Practical Meal Prep — Save time by leaving food cooking for hours, and use tougher cuts of meat that will be left incredibly tender.

 

Figo perfects the sous vide experience 

More than a precision cooker, Figo is built to save time in the kitchen, ensuring your food is ready when you schedule it.

Even if you're starting in the kitchen or have years of experience, Figo empowers you to become a better cook:

  • Hands-Free Cooking — Whether you’re busy with work or entertaining guests, Figo lets you focus on the other busy parts of life. 
  • Vacuum Sealer Attachment — Seal your food with your favorite herbs and spices while also helping to retain nutrients and cook food in its natural juices for better results. 
  • Perfect, Consistent Results — Eliminate the margin of error and cook your meals like a pro every time with precise temperature control.
  • Keeps Food Fresh — Figo safely chills the main compartment before and after cooking down to FDA Recommended 37° F with our patented Dry Sous Vide System. 
  • App-Assisted Perfection — Cook from 20+ chef-made recipes or choose your adventure with temperature control and cook times.
  • Cook From Anywhere — Figo connects to the world via WiFi, allowing you to control your meals and schedule no matter where you are.
  • No More Mush — Removes water from the main compartment after cooking, so food isn’t crushed by pressure resulting in flakier salmon, tender meats, and crisp vegetables.

 

 

 

 

 

Get started with Figo for $139
 With FREE Shipping to the US
 
 

 

 

 PRECISELY COOKED
TO PERFECTION

 

Restaurant quality results, every time

Get consistent in the kitchen. Don’t worry about overcooking or watching an open flame - Figo handles the rest.

Sous vide is used by many high-end restaurants and even in chain establishments to ensure consistent results. With Figo, cook with the same level of precision while also exploring new flavor combinations or recipes to get:

  • Consistent results when you cook means less anxiety about over/undercooking.
  • Healthier dishes that use few fats and oils while keeping natural moisture.
  • More nutrients that don't get burned away from hot temperatures.

 

Vacuum sealer attachment

Figo is the only sous vide machine with the extra convenience of having a vacuum sealer directly on the device.

Take even less time preparing your meals with our vacuum sealer attachment available on the Figo Deluxe model, which works with popular vacuum seal bag varieties so that you don’t have to spend extra money on separate parts or machines. 

Flavors and moisture are locked in making it easy to get delicious and consistent results without heavy seasoning. Combined with precise temperature control, your food will have a higher yield (less food wasted), better texture, and more tender over traditional methods.

Add your ingredients to the bag and start the pump using the Figo app. 

 

Spend less time in the kitchen 

Save up to 6 hours each week when you cook with Figo, saving you time from dirty dishes and messy prep work.

Figo makes mealtime practical. Load and vacuum seal your food in as little as 30 seconds. Our Dry Sous Vide system keeps food chilled until it's time to cook. Leave frozen and prepared dishes inside Figo for when you're on the go. With a large 1.25-gallon storage tank, fit up to 4 servings. 

 

Precise temperature control 

Sous vide relies on keeping a consistent temperature to cook food perfectly. Figo’s sensors maintain that accuracy.

Cook to a +/- 1° temperature difference up 190° F for a perfect medium-rare steak, flaky salmon, or crisp vegetables that are still full of nutrients. Figo's high-quality temperature sensors to regulate the heat within the main cooking compartment. The propeller circulator keeps water moving around so that the temperature is the same everywhere.

The app makes it easy to set a custom temperature cook while giving you accurate times when your meal will be ready based on weight and ingredients.

 

Safely store food until cooking 

Like a small fridge, Figo’s Dry Sous Vide System helps keep food chilled to temperatures as low as 37° F.

Vacuum sealing is not enough to stop foodborne illness! They can develop with foods left at room temperature or if food isn't cooled down quickly. With our Dry Sous Vide System, Figo safely cools your food down, surpassing FDA guidelines (below 40° F within 2 hours).  

  • As a bonus, it's kept cold in a dry environment that saves food texture from water pressure.

 

 

 

 

FIGO'S REVOLUTIONARY
DRY SOUS VIDE SYSTEM

 

 

 

Chill food to as low as 37°F

Figo uses a dry Peltier system to keep food stored in safe temperatures that prevent spoilage and foodborne illness before and after cooking.

Unlike standard fridges, the Peltier system has no moving parts but transfers heat away from your food, safely chilling it down to FDA recommended guidelines (37° F in less than 2 hours). Incredibly power-efficient, it's like having a mini-fridge to hold onto food until it’s time to cook.

 

Heated water surrounds food inside 

Set the schedule and have water move in and heat up to the exact temperature desired when it's time to start cooking. 

Thanks to a propeller circulator, water heats up and distributes evenly throughout the cook. This helps flavors meld together while slowly preparing your food. With high-quality temperature sensors, we keep your food cooking at the exact temperature you set  (+/- 1° F variable).

 

Preserve texture and flavor

No one wants mushy meats and vegetables. By removing water after cooking, food maintains maximum texture and flavor.

After cooking, water is moved away from your food to help preserve the texture. Salmon remains flaky without extra water pressure, steaks stay tender, and vegetables don’t turn to mush!

*Did You Know? — The cooling after cooking helps bring flavor back into the food by absorbing volatile aromas and flavor while chilling. It’s an advanced technique by sous vide creator and chef Bruno Goussault that Figo users can automatically take advantage of it!

 
 
Get started with Figo for $139
 With FREE Shipping to the US
 

 

 

 

CONTROL FIGO
ANYTIME, ANYWHERE

 

 

 

Delicious meals on your time

Put down the cold takeout and come home to a warm, delicious meal you cooked with your phone.

With a hectic schedule, mealtime can be a challenge every day. You deserve to come home to a healthy meal, that's ready right when you arrive. Schedule Figo when you expect to arrive for a warm and healthy meal. With the iOS/Android compatible app, adjust your meal times from anywhere. Even mid-cook, Figo adjusts its program to chill food when finished within FDA-recommended guidelines.

 

Choose from over chef-curated 20+ recipes 

We worked with renowned Executive Chef Johnny Vernaglia to create fabulous recipes to cook with the Figo machine.

Our recipes give you the best sous vide experience possible! Choose from protein-based, vegetable-based, and dessert recipes in three levels of difficulty:

  • Advanced — Executive Chef
  • Intermediate — Sous Chef/Pastry Chef
  • Normal — Link Cook/Baker

For those wanting to try new cuisines, Figo's custom cook option gives full control.  Or tell Figo what food is loaded and what temperature it needs to be cooked to and let Figo figure out the cooking time for you.

 

Flexible WiFi Connectivity

Schedule or change scheduled cook no matter where you are thanks to
Figo's wireless connection.

Unlike other countertop cooking appliances limited by short-range Bluetooth connections, connect to Figo even outside of the home. Adjust cooking times if you’re running late from the office or running errands, letting you control your meal from anywhere!

If you’re having internet issues, Figo can also be controlled via Bluetooth.

 

 

 

UP CLOSE LOOK
AT FIGO'S SPECIFICATIONS

 

 

Free ebook with every Figo Deluxe

Get "Next Level Sous Vide" by Jason Veselak, a $35 value for free.

Jason Veselak, a fan of Figo, started Sous Vide Ways after falling in love with how easy it is for gourmet meals at home with so much ease and consistency. Next Level Sous Vide was born from his passion and research to share the art of sous vide. 

Everyone who orders the Figo Deluxe (with vacuum sealer attachment) will receive Jason's ebook within a few days of pledging. It's a small way for us to be able to share with you the excitement and passion we have for sous vide before you receive your Figo machine!

 

 

Get the Figo Deluxe for $149
 With FREE Shipping to the US
 

 

 

 

The team behind Figo

Rob Nappi and Ray Mazzie became friends while attending MBA school. Wide-eyed and full of ambition, the two of them gravitated toward each other on day one and have been close friends ever since. As a network and electrical engineer, Rob developed code to systemize time-consuming or difficult tasks. This systemized approach carried over into Rob’s personal life, which in part is why he recognized the kitchen is in dire need of automated systems. Once introduced to sous vide, most people love everything except the process itself. We all care about what we put in our bodies, but we don’t have time to prepare, let alone cook, the meals we know our bodies deserve. 

 

The Making of Figo

Our first prototype, made over three years ago, showed us that we could empower cooks of any level to make better food! 

 

Coming to your kitchen soon!

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Get Started with Figo for $139
 With FREE Shipping to the US

   PRECISELY COOKEDTO PERFECTION Restaurant quality results, every timeGet consistent in the kitchen. Don’t worry about overcooking or watching an open flame - Figo handles the rest.Sous vide is used by many high-end restaurants and even in chain establishments to ensure consistent results. With Figo, cook with the same level of precision while also exploring new flavor combinations or recipes to get:
Consistent results when you cook means less anxiety about over/undercooking.
Healthier dishes that use few fats and oils while keeping natural moisture.
More nutrients that don't get burned away from hot temperatures.
 Vacuum sealer attachmentFigo is the only sous vide machine with the extra convenience of having a vacuum sealer directly on the device.Take even less time preparing your meals with our vacuum sealer attachment available on the Figo Deluxe model, which works with popular vacuum seal bag varieties so that you don’t have to spend extra money on separate parts or machines. Flavors and moisture are locked in making it easy to get delicious and consistent results without heavy seasoning. Combined with precise temperature control, your food will have a higher yield (less food wasted), better texture, and more tender over traditional methods.Add your ingredients to the bag and start the pump using the Figo app.  Spend less time in the kitchen Save up to 6 hours each week when you cook with Figo, saving you time from dirty dishes and messy prep work.Figo makes mealtime practical. Load and vacuum seal your food in as little as 30 seconds. Our Dry Sous Vide system keeps food chilled until it's time to cook. Leave frozen and prepared dishes inside Figo for when you're on the go. With a large 1.25-gallon storage tank, fit up to 4 servings.  Precise temperature control Sous vide relies on keeping a consistent temperature to cook food perfectly. Figo’s sensors maintain that accuracy.Cook to a +/- 1° temperature difference up 190° F for a perfect medium-rare steak, flaky salmon, or crisp vegetables that are still full of nutrients. Figo's high-quality temperature sensors to regulate the heat within the main cooking compartment. The propeller circulator keeps water moving around so that the temperature is the same everywhere.The app makes it easy to set a custom temperature cook while giving you accurate times when your meal will be ready based on weight and ingredients. Safely store food until cooking Like a small fridge, Figo’s Dry Sous Vide System helps keep food chilled to temperatures as low as 37° F.Vacuum sealing is not enough to stop foodborne illness! They can develop with foods left at room temperature or if food isn't cooled down quickly. With our Dry Sous Vide System, Figo safely cools your food down, surpassing FDA guidelines (below 40° F within 2 hours).  As a bonus, it's kept cold in a dry environment that saves food texture from water pressure.    FIGO'S REVOLUTIONARYDRY SOUS VIDE SYSTEM   Chill food to as low as 37°FFigo uses a dry Peltier system to keep food stored in safe temperatures that prevent spoilage and foodborne illness before and after cooking.Unlike standard fridges, the Peltier system has no moving parts but transfers heat away from your food, safely chilling it down to FDA recommended guidelines (37° F in less than 2 hours). Incredibly power-efficient, it's like having a mini-fridge to hold onto food until it’s time to cook. Heated water surrounds food inside Set the schedule and have water move in and heat up to the exact temperature desired when it's time to start cooking. Thanks to a propeller circulator, water heats up and distributes evenly throughout the cook. This helps flavors meld together while slowly preparing your food. With high-quality temperature sensors, we keep your food cooking at the exact temperature you set  (+/- 1° F variable). Preserve texture and flavorNo one wants mushy meats and vegetables. By removing water after cooking, food maintains maximum texture and flavor.After cooking, water is moved away from your food to help preserve the texture. Salmon remains flaky without extra water pressure, steaks stay tender, and vegetables don’t turn to mush!*Did You Know? — The cooling after cooking helps bring flavor back into the food by absorbing volatile aromas and flavor while chilling. It’s an advanced technique by sous vide creator and chef Bruno Goussault that Figo users can automatically take advantage of it!
 
 

Get started with Figo for $139
 With FREE Shipping to the US




 
 


 

 
CONTROL FIGOANYTIME, ANYWHERE
 
 
 
Delicious meals on your time
Put down the cold takeout and come home to a warm, delicious meal you cooked with your phone.

With a hectic schedule, mealtime can be a challenge every day. You deserve to come home to a healthy meal, that's ready right when you arrive. Schedule Figo when you expect to arrive for a warm and healthy meal. With the iOS/Android compatible app, adjust your meal times from anywhere. Even mid-cook, Figo adjusts its program to chill food when finished within FDA-recommended guidelines.
 
Choose from over chef-curated 20+ recipes 
We worked with renowned Executive Chef Johnny Vernaglia to create fabulous recipes to cook with the Figo machine.
Our recipes give you the best sous vide experience possible! Choose from protein-based, vegetable-based, and dessert recipes in three levels of difficulty:


Advanced — Executive Chef

Intermediate — Sous Chef/Pastry Chef

Normal — Link Cook/Baker

For those wanting to try new cuisines, Figo's custom cook option gives full control.  Or tell Figo what food is loaded and what temperature it needs to be cooked to and let Figo figure out the cooking time for you.
 
Flexible WiFi Connectivity
Schedule or change scheduled cook no matter where you are thanks toFigo's wireless connection.

Unlike other countertop cooking appliances limited by short-range Bluetooth connections, connect to Figo even outside of the home. Adjust cooking times if you’re running late from the office or running errands, letting you control your meal from anywhere!
If you’re having internet issues, Figo can also be controlled via Bluetooth.

 



 

 
UP CLOSE LOOKAT FIGO'S SPECIFICATIONS
 

 
Free ebook with every Figo Deluxe
Get "Next Level Sous Vide" by Jason Veselak, a $35 value for free.

Jason Veselak, a fan of Figo, started Sous Vide Ways after falling in love with how easy it is for gourmet meals at home with so much ease and consistency. Next Level Sous Vide was born from his passion and research to share the art of sous vide. 
Everyone who orders the Figo Deluxe (with vacuum sealer attachment) will receive Jason's ebook within a few days of pledging. It's a small way for us to be able to share with you the excitement and passion we have for sous vide before you receive your Figo machine!
 

 
Get the Figo Deluxe for $149
 With FREE Shipping to the US

  
 
 
The team behind Figo

Rob Nappi and Ray Mazzie became friends while attending MBA school. Wide-eyed and full of ambition, the two of them gravitated toward each other on day one and have been close friends ever since. As a network and electrical engineer, Rob developed code to systemize time-consuming or difficult tasks. This systemized approach carried over into Rob’s personal life, which in part is why he recognized the kitchen is in dire need of automated systems. Once introduced to sous vide, most people love everything except the process itself. We all care about what we put in our bodies, but we don’t have time to prepare, let alone cook, the meals we know our bodies deserve. 
 
The Making of Figo

Our first prototype, made over three years ago, showed us that we could empower cooks of any level to make better food! 
 
Coming to your kitchen soon!

 
 
 
 


 
 
 
Get Started with Figo for $139
 With FREE Shipping to the US

story:
In A Nut Shell...

Hogan Chef is created by a team of talented individuals with no less than 20 years experience each in their respective fields. A new homemade food delivery app that aims to create income for stay-at-home moms, dads, home cooks and anyone that has a talent in the kitchen, offering multiple delivery options for the convenience of both parties. Hogan Chef will also include orders from your favorite restaurants.

Our name was inspired by the Native American word 'Hogan' meaning home. To be launched first in California, Hogan Chef offers authentic homemade food cooked with unique family recipes not found at any commercial restaurant.

Our project is important to us as we know that Hogan Chef, in this age and time, is a great way to bring extra income to any household.

Contributors would help us achieve our goal in launching Hogan Chef as well as surely helping families with the much needed income, bringing them together and helping them grow into a potential business in the future.

What We Need & What You Get

We are offering 25% in partnership for investors. We need a total of $5million to launch, allocated into the following:

  • $1.8M Team & Office Setup
  • $0.5M App & Website Development
  • $2.2M Marketing, Advertising and Content Development
  • $0.5M Research and Innovation

The Impact

Your contributions to the success of launching Hogan Chef will make a big difference in the lives of millions of people that need the extra income from working as a Hogan Chef from their own home. You will be also helping restaurants earn extra income with Hogan Chef's competitive delivery costs, especially to those that don't currently offer delivery,

The idea of the app is simple but bringing together the right team and making sure it is done right with no room for error from the start is our goal.

Our team is extremely talented and experienced in the F&B field, operations, branding, marketing and software development with several awards and successful milestones.

A fully detailed presentation explaining all financial, conceptual, statistical and operational information is available to be shared with any potential investor.

Other Ways You Can Help

Not being able to contribute, doesn't mean you can't help!

  • You can get the word out and make some noise about our campaign.
  • Use the Indiegogo share tools!

story:
**Our campaign has ended, but we are moving forward with our manufacturing and will be fulfilling all the orders!**

With the help of friends and family, we've pulled off what is needed to bring these little guys to market with our first production run. The support both through this campaign and behind the scenes has been AMAZING!!

Just a few hours left! Your Pre-Orders Still Help, No Matter What!

There's still time to pre-order our Awesome Gummy Bears at the absolute lowest price you'll ever get them (and with FREE shipping) right here on Indiegogo. We're bringing these tasty little guys to market whether we meet our funding target or not. So thank you for your support to the very end!

Hi there. My name is Siouxie (pronounced Susie).

I’m a wife, mother of 4 grown children, and grandmother of three.

I started making my own gummy bears a couple of years ago because when it comes to a gummy bear I’d feed my own grandchildren, the selection is extremely limited. And when it comes to sugar-free, zero impact, truly tasty gummy bears…there are none.

Until now.

I spent a lot of time researching these little guys. I tried to find gummy bears that aren’t filled with crap. But I couldn’t find them. What I found were:

  • "sugar-free” gummy bears that have actually been shown to spike blood sugar.
  • sugar-free brands have been known to cause explosive side effects.
  • organic gummies that have 12-15g of sugar per serving. That’s only 8 or 9 gummy candies. That’s more than 3.5 tsp of sugar.

I decided to make something that wasn't like any of the others. Something better.

Zero sugar with no sugar alcohols and no artificial sweeteners without the weird aftertaste.

Only organic natural flavors and natural colors from fruit and vegetable sources made with non-GMO ingredients, and that actually tastes delicious.

We chose unique sweeteners with diabetic and keto people in mind, that taste as good (if not better) than the real thing.

It’s a recipe that consistently makes tasty gummy bears with the perfect gummy texture and chew, and (bonus) doesn't stick in people's teeth. 
 


We came up with flavors we love based on our favorites and taste-tests with people like you.

 

 

Every ingredient has been carefully chosen to ensure that there’s nothing sketchy, and our ingredients are sourced within the USA. This was challenging on some ingredients. But we did it.

What People Are Saying

We did taste tests with regular people who love gummy bears and the taste of sugar. Here's what they had to say...

 

 

 

 

 

Manufacturing Gummy Bears

There is a lot that goes into bringing a custom gummy bear recipe to market. The manufacturing process is lengthy and costly. We had no idea when we started down this path.

That’s probably why there isn’t another product like this on the market. But we decided that it had to be done anyway.

We’ve created a perfect recipe. Designed the packaging. And we are almost ready to release our Awesome Gummy Bears to the world.

Gummy bears can’t be made in small batches at home for retail purposes because they can’t be made at any volume and it’s not sustainable…

Gummy bears are made on very specific equipment and the smallest commercial run is 25,000 pounds which works out to 200,000 bags-and that’s only if we can guarantee bigger runs in the future. The equipment alone for a gummy line costs over a million dollars. We checked.

But right now, we have a state-of-the-art facility here in the USA standing by to make our Awesome Gummy Bears, we just need your help funding it.


 

Why Awesome Gummy Bears Matter

This is the first truly sugar-free gummy bear that doesn’t come with horrific digestive side effects or a hidden sugar load. The ingredients are all clean, nothing artificial. They are super keto-friendly with only 1 net carb in a whole bag. AND they taste really yummy!

The world needs these. These are truly the gummy bears I would have been happy to buy for myself and my family.

The Process to Market

We've formulated a recipe that works every time, and we've gone through exact steps to approximate the manufacturing process. Our prototypes are awesome, but now we're ready to scale.

This is a unique recipe that has never been used in the manufacture of a commercial gummy bear, but we've worked closely with formulators, R & D, a professor of candy making, flavor experts, and each ingredient's manufacturer to create a product that we're confident will scale. 

*Update: We've successfully navigated two bench-top trials and are on our way to the next step. We also have another $100K of the needed funds. 

Each small batch test costs just under $20K in ingredients and manufacturing. We are anticipating no more than two of these to ensure that everything goes smoothly.

Our full commercial run will cost just over $300K for ingredients, packaging, and manufacturing. We're confident that this will sell out quickly based on early taste tests and hundreds of surveys. 

Ways You Can Help

So, I’m asking you first, to:

1) Pre-order now as a backer. And then

2) Share this campaign with your family, with moms and dads, keto-enthusiasts, and friends. And help us bring Awesome Gummy Bears to the world.

*Update: We've successfully navigated two bench-top trials and are on our way to the next step. We also have another $100K of the needed funds. 
Each small batch test costs just under $20K in ingredients and manufacturing. We are anticipating no more than two of these to ensure that everything goes smoothly.
Our full commercial run will cost just over $300K for ingredients, packaging, and manufacturing. We're confident that this will sell out quickly based on early taste tests and hundreds of surveys. 

Ways You Can Help

So, I’m asking you first, to:
1) Pre-order now as a backer. And then
2) Share this campaign with your family, with moms and dads, keto-enthusiasts, and friends. And help us bring Awesome Gummy Bears to the world.

story:
“Picklestone” Make Japanese pickles just in one night!

Just place the diced vegetables into the pot, cover with salt, put the stone on top and wait. With only these three steps, you can easily take in fermented foods into your diet. In addition, Tsukemono reduces food waste. Did you know that 1.3 billion tons of food are thrown away every year in the world? Vegetable skins, roots, and leaves that are usually thrown away can also be pickled.


 Let's practice zero waste life with Picklestone! 

There are pickles that can be made in just one night.

A common way of making pickles, requires soaking the vegetables in brine and waiting for them to ferment - which can take a long time.

However, the Japanese pickles "Tsukemono" only take overnight.
 With Picklestone, it's surprisingly easy to make.

【Picklestone220】

SIZE:d100mm×H215mm 

WEIGHT:1170g

【Picklestone150】

SIZE:d100mm×H135mm 

WEIGHT:800g

【Picklestone115】

SIZE:d65mm×H185mm 

WEIGHT:600g

How to use

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=JXPq6JdBY9Y

 To make Tsukemono, you need to first drain the water from the vegetables and make a bacteria-free environment for the vegetables by using salt. Preservation power improves by salt entering the vegetable fiber, and the number of lactic acid bacteria increases, and the sourness of the pickle is produced. Easy as that, now you have Japanese style pickles.

 

Why put a stone?

Why can pickles be made in just one day? The secret lies in the weight.
 By applying pressure vertically to a cylindrical glass pot, the speed at which water is drained from the vegetables increases, and this is how the pickles get their unique texture!
 Pickled vegetables are completed in about 4 hours for finely cut vegetables.

In addition, when we seal the container with the stone, the pickles do not come in contact with air and the preservation power improves.

Health benefits of Japanese pickles

If you can't eat a large volume of raw vegetables, pickle them and you can get plenty of fiber and vitamins. In addition, the effect of lactic acid bacteria improves the intestinal environment. Japanese-style pickles are the perfect vegan superfood. Why not make them a part of your daily diet? 

 Smart design without waste

1. Picklestone can be stored in the refrigerator door

Its smart design saves space even in a small kitchen. Pickles can be made even for one person.

2. Simple structure

 Stones and wood are hygienic, and easily removed for cleaning.
 After use, dry it and store it in the shade. 

About the stone

 For the Picklestone sold in Japan, we use the highest quality "Aji stone" from Kagawa, Japan's which is known for stones.
  Used in the 1964 Tokyo Olympic Torch, garden stones of the Prime Minister's Office, and hot springs dedicated to the Emperor, we use precious stone mined from a that has lasted for the past 400 years. 

Our mission

How can we ensure that not only Japanese people but also people from other countries enjoy pickles?There are two problems that need to be solved.

The first is that after you receive the product, you do not have the ingredients on hand.

Japanese pickles require salt, Konbu, and dried red chili.But we learned that getting Konbu outside of Japan was much harder than we imagined.

Of course, it is possible to make pickles with just salt, but we wanted people to enjoy more traditional pickles, so we decided to include the Picklestone starter kit.


With this, all you need to do is prepare the vegetables you have at home and you can start making pickles right away the day you receive them.

The second challenge is that many people are not familiar with the taste of Japanese pickles, so the person making the pickles cannot judge whether the taste of the pickles made according to the recipe is correct or not.

 

For those who are making pickles for the first time, we decided to develop a perfect original soy sauce that is much easier to use. All you have to do is put soy sauce into the pot with the vegetables. There is no risk of failure.

We developed our own original blend of soy sauce.

The added flavor of the shiitake mushrooms changes the taste of the pickles for the better.It is also free of animal ingredients, so it can be eaten by vegans.

About the recipe

We enclose a booklet with 12 recipes for pickles made with salt, which should be your first step, and also 20 recipes for dishes arranged with pickles made with magic soy sauce.

We developed a new set to introduce people to traditional Japanese pickles. Picklestone is the best product for making pickles.This challenge will make more Japanese pickle lovers!

I am convinced that it will make people feel more familiar with fermented foods.

story:
Please make sure to check out the Updates tab for updates on the project and what we've got going on. 

 

Swag!

Shirts (emailed about size and color after donating)

                              FRONT                                                                               BACK

 

Glasses

 

Glasses + Growler Combo

 

What is Modcraft?

Modcraft Brewing is Findlay’s newest addition to the craft beer scene. Three guys came together, each with unique strengths, abilities and experiences, with a plan to produce beer that takes an alternative approach to style.  We've worked hard to achieve this dream for over 3 years. Investing all our spare time and personal savings, along with the support of friend and family loans, our dreams and hard work is paying off and becoming a reality.  We now have an excellent venue in the heart of downtown Findlay, a functioning 3.5BBL brewhouse, and are extremely blessed to have some awesome friends and family that have helped us along the way!

 

Modcraft was born from a love for music and quality crafted beer (mod for modulation and craft for craft beer), we are Flavor from Sound. We're driven to brew the highest quality ales we possibly can, building bridges in our community, and providing an alternative atmosphere and take on our local beer culture

 

 

We have been quietly working in the background at our brewery location since January 2020 getting everything moving forward. Opening a brewery comes with a hefty price tag. Having done this all on our own (to this point) through our savings and friend and family loans, we are left with a longer list of necessities than we have cash to support. We also had to make the tough decision to pivot from draft-only to canning, in the face of the pandemic. We hope that any of you that are passionate about beer, or local small businesses and pushing the limits of what is available in your community, will consider becoming a supporter of this special cause.  We are a brewery for the community with the intention of being a platform for advocacy, fundraising (non-profit), and collaboration.

 

Your contributions will not only validate our mission and your desire for more options, it will ultimately help us reach our goal of being an anchor in the Findlay area.

 

 

What We Need & Why

Tables & Standing Bar Tops ($560 - $750/table); example https://www.etsy.com/listing/246838542/the-foun... 

 

Barstools & Chairs ($65 - 95/chair); example
https://gaseating.com/Dante-613D

 

Patio Furniture ($230 - 350/patio set; for seating out front/back); example https://www.displays2go.com/P-38991/Square-Alum... 

 

Shelving (Kegs) ($500 - 800/rack depending on size - need 4-5 racks); example https://www.webstaurantstore.com/eagle-group-kr...
 

Shelving (Merch / Board Games) ($200 - 300/unit - need various types and sizes); example https://www.wayfair.com/17-Stories--Bergen-Pipe... 

 

Lighting ($160 - $200/unit - updating all front of house lighting); example https://www.overstock.com/Lighting-Ceiling-Fans...

 

In order to effectively and appropriately serve the greater Findlay area with our brews, we need to invest in furnishing our tap house. Without tables and seating, we won’t be able to have comfortable arrangements for our customers. Without keg racks, we won’t be able to adequately stock our walk-in freezer to keep the draft lines full of delicious beer for patrons. Finishing off the aesthetics with matching lighting, shelves, and other decor pull the rest of the establishment together, helping to make it a comfortable place where people want to hang out. Without these items our tap house will struggle to become a place where people enjoy each other’s company.

 

The Impact

While these items may not seem the most exciting, they are critical for our success. Your donation to Modcraft will help that we are able to produce a quality product  that can be shared and enjoyed directly from our establishment. 

 

This campaign is intended to be completely transparent and we are willing to answer any questions you may have as to why we might need these items or a clearer understanding of how it impacts the brewery and its products.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

We know that cash isn't the only way to get where we are headed. If you have any skills and extra time on your hands, we'd love to know how you may be able to help us in other ways around the brewery.  Everyday there's something new going on and we pay handsomely in beer and pizza should you want to get your hands dirty with us!

 

You can also help by getting the word out about our campaign to your friends, colleagues and loved ones via social media platforms.  If everyone is able to share this campaign with just a few people, we feel confident that we can reach many, many people that may be interested and able to donate to the cause.

 

Thank you so much for your support!

 

All items must be claimed at the brewery

story:
FRESH PRODUCE FOR MODERN LIFESTYLES

 

The Acqua Garden is an innovative vertical growing system enabling anyone, anywhere to grow fresh, heathy produce in abundance, wherever they live.

 

A fusion of elegance and functionality, the Acqua Garden is designed for modern living. It’s automated and self-watering and has a range of useful functions. It’s simple to set up and once in place, it really runs itself. 

 

Choose from battery or solar options, and you can soon be enjoying the pleasures of gardening and growing in a way that suits you.

 

Our Acqua Garden package includes everything you need to get growing - the core tower system, smart irrigation pack, growing medium pack, liquid nutrients, and a selection of useful accessories.  A complete garden in a box! 

Buy for yourself at a super discount

Take a Multi or Friends and Family Pack for even better value

Or make a pledge for a school or charity

Your support is greatly appreciated. By this, we will be able to complete our production run and ship Acqua Gardens all over the world.

 

Convenience           Freshness             Low Effort            High Reward

No tools are required, just unpack it, set it up in a few easy steps, add water add plants and that's it - and away you go!

 

The Acqua Garden is all about convenience. Once set up, it really runs itself. And by growing at home, your produce is right there, just harvest what you need, when you need it.

You'll reduce your trips to the store, too, We’ve designed everything to make it simple and convenient - convenience gardening at its best. 

 
 
The Acqua Garden is super abundant, with enough space to grow up to 72 plants at once, so you can expect abundant harvests. It's a highly productive growing machine - your complete Kitchen Garden!
 
 
 

Nutritionally you can't get better food than that you harvest and eat immediately. 

Food grown at home has far higher vitamin and nutritional value. It makes so much sense. The produce you grow in an Acqua Garden is nutritional, clean and healthy. You’ll soon be feeling energised and will know that what you’re eating is 100% pure. 

 

Environmentally you'll be doing your bit too. Growing your own can start to reduce your carbon footprint by reducing your reliance on industrial farming, food transportation miles, reducing trips to the shops and reducing your use of single use plastic packaging. The plants you're growing even turn CO2 into O2!

In today’s busy world, we should not only be focused on our physical health, but also our mental health. Gardening is is relaxing and highly therapeutic. Studies have shown that being around plants and looking after them helps to relieve anxiety and stress.

 

We work with a number of schools and charities to bring the pleasures of gardening and growing to the widest range of people, regardless of ability. 

 

The Acqua Garden is a great educational product, and we’ve developed a program for schools to get the most out of the system. You can nominate a school or leave it to us to find a school in your area to provide the Acqua Garden to.

We are working with a number of charities to deploy Acqua Gardens in gardening and wellness projects. You can nominate a charity or leave it to us to deploy the pledged systems across our network of partner charities.

The Acqua Garden is a vertical garden, designed for modern lifestyles. It has a reservoir, a tower of growing pods, a self-watering smart irrigation system, and a rotatable tower. It runs on battery or mains, with simple recharging.

Set the tower height to the configuration that suits you, 3, 5 or 6 levels - you choose! Swap the levels and heights around if you like, that's easy too! 

This is our premier product. With all the features of the Acqua Garden but with a solar panel incorporated on the front of the reservoir. 

This unique feature makes the system even easier to run, and even more environmentally friendly. With climate change a major concern for us all, this is another innovation we’re delighted to have introduced. 

The Acqua Garden is modular, and can be set up in many different configurations. Have as many levels as you like. Swap them around. It’s plug and play.

The Acqua Garden can be set up outside or inside. Outside, you can set it on your patio, balcony or terrace. If you want to grow inside, take our inside growing pack to grow all year round. Its simple, elegant and effective, wherever its located.  

There are now many home growing systems and kits out there, all part of the grow your own revolution. We applaud this. But we made something different. 

 

UNIQUE FEATURES 

Battery Driven - The Acqua Garden runs on a battery - or mains power, you get both options in the package. We believe the Acqua Garden is the only such system that can be run on a battery.

Solar Option - Our solar version is groundbreaking. No other system has a solar panel embedded in the system.

Water Feature - This is also unique. It adds further beauty but also oxygenates the water for faster plant growth.

 

The Acqua Garden also rotates with an embedded bearing, it's modular so you can choose your preferred configuration, it can be used outside or inside with our elegant grow light package, and can grow up to 72 plants at once. The Acqua Garden is certainly different. We made it that way. 

With an Acqua Garden, there's almost no limit on what you can grow. It's so versatile. 

You can grow herbs, salads, leafy greens, veggies, tomatoes, peppers, chillies - even flowers! All grow really well. How about some of these: 

Basil - Parsley - Thyme - Rosemary - Sage - Mint - Coriander 

Butterhead Lettuce - Mixed Salad Leaves - Oriental Mix - Lollo Rosso 

Mustard Greens - Spinach - Kale - Cabbage - Swiss Chard 

Sweet Peppers - Tomatoes - Chillies 

Strawberries - Blueberries - Flowers

“I have been running two Acqua Gardens over the Summer, and I’ve been impressed with the results. The system is very easy to set up and use, plants grow healthily and quickly and the automatic watering is a great feature.

The tower rotation is very innovative, making access to plants easy, and by turning the tower, all plants get their share of the sun. With space at a premium for many, the Acqua Garden packs a lot in with its vertical set up, and is a great way to grow your own healthy, nutritious food with very little effort in very little space.

The coir growing medium is clean, peat free and nice to use and the nutrients give the plants a real boost. All in all, a really nice product.” - Mark Lane, 2019

 

 

With busy modern lifestyles, time is at a premium. And for many, the heavy digging and lifting of conventional gardening can be a real chore.

The Acqua Garden is gardening made easy. We’ve designed it to be simple to set up with minimal maintenance needed. Its vertical configuration avoids all of that bending, digging and weeding. The tower rotates, for ease of access. And it waters itself. Simple and effective.

 

The Acqua Garden is a fusion of elegance and functionality. Designed to be useful, productive and simple to use. But also to be desirable, a product with aesthetic appeal, to enhance the look of a patio, terrace or kitchen.

The graceful curves and clean lines of the Acqua Garden, its water fountain and the design of the reservoir base are all aspects of the design we wanted. But without compromising on functionality. With all this, you’re ready to create your own living sculpture. 

 

“ I am so pleased with my Acqua Garden which, as you can see from the photos, was very productive this year, yet quite easy to look after. The butterhead lettuce was very successful as were all the herbs, and just this week I was still picking chillis. I am going to experiment with what I might grow indoors over the winter now.  Thanks very much for help with questions and supplying things promptly. ” - Victoria Walters, 2019

“It’s a great product, well constructed and thought through. The customer service was outstanding. I’m looking forward to many years of healthy eating to come!” - Tony Fongster, 2019

 

“I got my Acqua Tower set up back in June. Totally new to growing. I found it incredibly easy to get produce very quickly. Within a couple of weeks, the little plugs had bloomed and I was getting fresh produce every day.

Not only that, but the flavours were far more intense than a lot of the stuff I had been buying from the supermarket. I love the fact that I can go out every day and harvest whatever I need. I also loved the fact that I could get a wide range of herbs, vegetables and salads in such a small convenient package. ” - Mark Newman, 2019

With an Acqua Garden, you are back in control. No pesticides or harmful chemicals on your food, no GMO, and you choose what you grow. The food you produce will be so fresh, with amazing flavours and with all of its vitamins and nutrition.

Isn’t it time to take back control of what you eat?

Have you noticed how little flavour there is now in shop bought produce? We have too. Flavour is so much better in your own-grown produce. It's not just the freshness and better nutrition - let’s talk about flavour. 

The supermarkets sell commodity produce, designed to have a long shelf life. It's bland but it lasts. But what’s the point? Food is about flavour.

With an Acqua Garden, you’ll rediscover the real flavour of strawberries, tomatoes, basil, sweet peppers, coriander, butterhead lettuce and everything else you grow. Once you eat food from an Acqua Garden, we guarantee you will never go back. 

Sustainability is at the core of the Acqua Garden’s design. With an Acqua Garden you are growing sustainably. With all of our challenges with the environment, climate change and other critical issues, we are doing our part. 

There are many environmental benefits with the Acqua Garden including:

Reduce your consumption of shop-bought produce. The food you buy in the store has a huge carbon footprint. By growing your own, you’ll reduce this dramatically.

Save water. The Acqua Garden uses up to 90% less water than conventional growing. Water is a valuable commodity. Conserve it with an Acqua Garden.

Coconut coir growing medium. We are a peat free business, our peat bogs should be protected! Coco coir is sustainable, renewable and 100% organic.

Low energy consumption. The Acqua Garden uses very little power. A micro pump uses just 14 watts of electricity, a few minutes a day. Our solar version is even better, using the power of the sun.

Recyclable. We use 100% recyclable food grade HDPE 2 plastic and operate a ‘Circle of Life’ policy. At the end of its life, we will offer to  take back your Acqua Garden and have it all recycled.

The Acqua Garden is available globally and for purchases in this campaign, we will ship FREE of charge to the purchaser, in accordance with our terms and conditions.

We look forward to seeing Acqua Gardens all over the world, providing a new way of gardening to the widest range of people, everywhere.

story:
ORDER FROM OUR WEBSITE

store.smartgrillusa.com

 

 

Patent Pending Device

IMPORTANT UPDATE: This project is currently in the first production batch phase and devices will start shipping as soon as possible (the latest is November). We appreciate your support!

— What It Is —

Smart Grill™️ is a WIFI device that connects your charcoal grill or smoker to your home network giving you the ability to control the temperature from your phone, Google Home or Alexa. Simply connect the device to your grill or smoker, insert the probe into your cooking chamber, and BAM, let Smart Grill do the rest.

 

 

— Works With —

Oklahoma Joe's
Weber
Big Green Egg
Kamado Joe
Pit Barrel
Char-Griller Kamado
Offset Smokers fitted with a butterfly valve

*Additional adapters in development.
Closer to the shipment date we will send you a link via email to select a grill adapter if needed.

 

— How It Works —

Download the IOS or Android app, pair your Smart Grill™️ device and connect it to your home WIFI. Attach your device to your grill or smoker directly or with the provided adapter. Insert the provided probe into the cooking chamber and you're ready to go. Now that your device is set up you will be able to control it from anywhere, like the beach or hiking or even while playing soccer in the park.

 

 

— Inspiration —

Smart Grill™️ was invented because we absolutely love the charcoal and wood flavor of smoked
meat, but it was very time-consuming and kept us from our day-to-day life (work and
family). On weekends, we would stay up late smoking a brisket and the next day were
exhausted by early evening. So, we put our heads together and developed Smart Grill™️. It’s powered by AI and keeps a steady temperature throughout your cook, giving you time back to spend with your family and friends, living life together.

 




 

— Technical Specs —

  • Wi-Fi 2.4 GHz, support WPA/WPA2
  • 802.11 b/g/n
  • 4000mah battery (24h battery life)
  • Micro USB charging
  • Mobile App, Google Home, and Alexa integration

 

— Mobile App —

 

 

— Meet The Founders —

Matt Hill (left) is a native Texan and certified Kansas City Barbecue Judge. As a KCBS and BBQ competitor, Matt has won awards for his 'que and enjoys bringing Traditional Texas barbecue to Southern California.

Juliano Teixeira (right) started developing software applications when he was only 15 years old. He has worked with major Hollywood studios developing custom software. He has a passion for BBQ and technology.

 

— Requirements —

Smart Grill™️ requires a grill or smoker that has a manually adjustable air intake valve. This device does not work with propane grills. 

 

— Ready For Production —

The Smart Grill™️ prototype is complete and ready for production. We have partnered with great manufacturers and are ready to take the next step to make it widely available.
story_txt:
ORDER FROM OUR WEBSITE
store.smartgrillusa.com
 
 
Patent Pending Device
IMPORTANT UPDATE: This project is currently in the first production batch phase and devices will start shipping as soon as possible (the latest is November). We appreciate your support!

— What It Is —
Smart Grill™️ is a WIFI device that connects your charcoal grill or smoker to your home network giving you the ability to control the temperature from your phone, Google Home or Alexa. Simply connect the device to your grill or smoker, insert the probe into your cooking chamber, and BAM, let Smart Grill do the rest.
 

 
— Works With —
Oklahoma Joe'sWeberBig Green EggKamado JoePit BarrelChar-Griller KamadoOffset Smokers fitted with a butterfly valve
*Additional adapters in development.Closer to the shipment date we will send you a link via email to select a grill adapter if needed.
 
— How It Works —
Download the IOS or Android app, pair your Smart Grill™️ device and connect it to your home WIFI. Attach your device to your grill or smoker directly or with the provided adapter. Insert the provided probe into the cooking chamber and you're ready to go. Now that your device is set up you will be able to control it from anywhere, like the beach or hiking or even while playing soccer in the park.
 


 
— Inspiration —
Smart Grill™️ was invented because we absolutely love the charcoal and wood flavor of smokedmeat, but it was very time-consuming and kept us from our day-to-day life (work andfamily). On weekends, we would stay up late smoking a brisket and the next day wereexhausted by early evening. So, we put our heads together and developed Smart Grill™️. It’s powered by AI and keeps a steady temperature throughout your cook, giving you time back to spend with your family and friends, living life together.
 

 

— Technical Specs —

Wi-Fi 2.4 GHz, support WPA/WPA2
802.11 b/g/n
4000mah battery (24h battery life)
Micro USB charging
Mobile App, Google Home, and Alexa integration

 
— Mobile App —
 
 
— Meet The Founders —

Matt Hill (left) is a native Texan and certified Kansas City Barbecue Judge. As a KCBS and BBQ competitor, Matt has won awards for his 'que and enjoys bringing Traditional Texas barbecue to Southern California.
Juliano Teixeira (right) started developing software applications when he was only 15 years old. He has worked with major Hollywood studios developing custom software. He has a passion for BBQ and technology.
 
— Requirements —
Smart Grill™️ requires a grill or smoker that has a manually adjustable air intake valve. This device does not work with propane grills. 
 

— Ready For Production —
The Smart Grill™️ prototype is complete and ready for production. We have partnered with great manufacturers and are ready to take the next step to make it widely available.

story:
Food Warmer with Individual Porcelain Bowl

 

Hello! We are Swanz!​

A humble start-up from Singapore that specialise in porcelain household products. Our mission is to provide practical everyday product that embodies marvelous benefits of porcelain. 

 

Food Storage For Family

 

We believe that home cooking for family should be simple and easy. Using porcelain as the core of the product, cooking at home never been healthier and easier.

We understand as home cook, food storage is essential. So we design Kokoro Food Warmer. A one in all porcelain food warmer, with tiered individual porcelain bowls. We design Kokoro food warmer to be practical to use. We want to create a product that able to be used for multiple occasions and suited for different needs. 

 

Tiered porcelain bowls perfect for families

 

 

One Product, Multiple Functions

Having tiered individual porcelain bowls allowed home cooks to make multiple dishes and store it in one go. Moreover, porcelain bowls is so versatile and able to be used for different dishes and usage. It is microwaveable, dishwasher safe, and able to be stored in fridge*.

 

Comes with individual porcelain bowls. Suitable for any food, any time.

Able to be arranged into several configurations. Stack and Store multiple dishes. Perfect for family takeaways.

 

Microwaveable porcelain bowl. Prep and pre-cook your food.

 

Prepare uncooked meals inside porcelain bowls or pre-cook it with microwave*. Stack different types of food in one go. Heat from preheated food circulates within vacuum insulated carrier, enable the food warmer to continue cooking or slow cook the food. 

 

Store porcelain bowls in fridge and reheat in microwave.

 

Chill leftover food with individual porcelain bowl in fridge. Use silicone lid to ensure hygiene. Reheat and save it for later. Keeping food hot or cold for more than 8 hours.

 

 *Only porcelain bowls, without handle.

 

New Rewards. Pledge S$88 or more.

 

Multiple Configurations

 

Swanz Kokoro able to be configured into multiple configurations suits your family needs. Kokoro Large Food Warmer feeds 2 - 3 pax. Able to be configured into 2 tier and 3 tier. Kokoro Medium Food Warmer feeds 1-2 pax, configured into 1 tier or 2 tier.

 

Kokoro Large Food warmer configured into 3 tier (1150ml) and 2 tier (1400ml). Feeds 2 - 3 pax.

 

Kokoro Medium Food Warmer configured into 1 tier (1100ml) and 2 tier (850ml). Feeds 1 - 2 pax.

 

 

Porcelain Wonders: No leftover Stain or Smell

There are many wonderful benefits of using porcelain. One of them would be easy to clean. Porcelain are made from kaolin clay and fired at temperatures as high as 2,600°F. This makes porcelain pores extremely fine, making it naturally easy to clean and prevents any stain and smell to linger on it.

Easy to Clean

 

Our fine porcelain bowls are microwavable*, dishwasher safe*, free from rust, leftover grease, stain and smell. 100% free from BPA and chemical leaching.

 

Comparison Table

 

*Only porcelain bowls, without handle.

 

 

Suitable for All Kinds of Food

All Swanz products are made of fine porcelain, suitable for any kinds of food without having the risk of metal leaching or chemical reactions. 100% BPA Free, suitable for baby food, confinement food, or Chinese herbal soups.

 

 

Keeping Food Fresh All Day

Kokoro Food Warmer suitable for any occasions, be it for picnic, bento lunch or keeping food at home. Exterior made of high grade vacuum insulated 304 Stainless Steel. Able to keep food hot or cold for more than 8 hours.

 

 

Key Features

 

 Individual Fine Porcelain Bowls

Porcelain are made from kaolin clay and fired at temperatures as high as 2,600°F. This makes porcelain pores extremely fine, making it naturally easy to clean and prevents any stain and smell to linger on it. It is also microwave, dishwasher safe.

Tiered design making it easy to stack different types of food.

 

Swanz Kokoro porcelain bowl is available in 3 different sizes:

Porcelain A: 1100ml

Porcelain B: 550ml

Porcelain C: 300ml

 

 

4 Different Configurations:

  1. Kokoro Large Food Warmer 1400ml: 1pc Porcelain A (1100ml) + 1 pc Porcelain C (300ml)
  2. Kokoro Large Food Warmer 1150ml: 1pcs Porcelain B (550ml) + 2 pc Porcelain C (300ml)
  3. Kokoro Medium Food Warmer 1100ml:  1pc Porcelain A (1100ml)
  4. Kokoro Medium Food Warmer 850ml: 1pcs Porcelain B (550ml) + 1 pc Porcelain C (300ml)

 

 

 304 Food Grade Stainless Steel Carrier

Using the highest grade of stainless steel, even our stainless steel container is food safe. You are able to store food inside.

Vacuum Insulated. Suitable to keep food

 

High Insulation Power, Continue Cooking

With high insulation power, Kokoro Food Warmer is able to transform into magic cooking pot. Perfect for slow cooking. Pre-cook your food and continue cooking with Swanz Food Warmer.

304 Food Grade Stainless Steel

 

Story: We Let Real Home Cooks Try!

We let real home cooks to try Kokoro Food Warmer and they love it!

Real photos by Real Home Cooks

 

 

Video by Eve Tong from Singapore

She wrote: My daughter saw me holding a Swanz pink food warmer which can kept hot or cold food more than 8 hours. She was so excited that she wanted to let me let her bring it to school, however, I said it’s porcelain interior. But, she said that she would protect it no matter what!

I love this brand very much, although it is made of ceramic, we can always ask our children to be extra careful at school! You should try out this brand as well as it is of great quality for our kids!

 

 

Baby Safe Silicone Lid

Silicone lid with multiple functions. Prevent spillage inside exterior shell. Able to stack and used for all Kokoro individual porcelain bowls. Cover and store in fridge. Microwaveable and 100% BPA Free.

Able to stack, prevents spillage.

 

Convenient Handle

Each porcelain bowls comes with convenient handle for easy take outs. Please make sure fill up the food up to the handle for convenience.

 

Improved Handle: Now with silicone wrapped to ensure hygiene.

Remove handle when placed in microwave or dishwasher.

 

 

Easy Clean Silicone. No Leaking.

Equipped with our signature Easy Clean silicone, Swanz Kokoro exterior is completely leak proof. Made of baby safe material, it is easy to take out and to clean. 100% food safe and BPA Free.

 

Premium Accessories Included

 

Full set accessories included

 

Kokoro Food Warmer comes with a water resistant Drawstring Bag and a Porcelain Cutlery Set. The bag strap is adjustable and can be use in 2 ways. The interior is made of water resistant material, making it easy to clean.

 

Porcelain cutleries set and water resistant bag.

 

4 Different Colours, 2 Different Sizes

Comes in 4 different colours. Steel, purple, pink and black. Available in 2 sizes, Large size and Medium size. Large size (1400 / 1150ml), Medium Size (1100 / 850ml).

Swanz Large Kokoro Food Warmer 1400/1150ml

 

Kokoro Medium Food Warmer. 1100/850ml.


Rewards

 

Save on Shipping. Get Bundles.

 

Kokoro Medium Food Warmer

INCLUDES:

 A: 1x Porcelain Bowl A (1100ml)

 D: 1x Kokoro Medium Stainless Steel Container

 G: 1× Silicone Lid

 A: 1x Porcelain Bowl A (1100ml) 

 C: 1x Porcelain bowl C (300ml)

 D: 1x Kokoro Medium Stainless Steel Container

 G: 2× Silicone Lid

 

Kokoro Medium Food Warmer: Combo Set 

INCLUDES:

 A: 1x Porcelain Bowl A (1100ml)

 B: 1x Porcelain Bowl B (550ml)

 D: 1x Kokoro Medium Stainless Steel Container

 E: 1x Waterproof Drawstring Bag Pouch

 F: 1x Porcelain Cutlery Set

 G: 2× Silicone Lid

 A: 1x Porcelain Bowl A (1100ml)

 B: 1x Porcelain Bowl B (550ml)

 C: 2x Porcelain Bowl C (300ml)

 H: 1x Kokoro Large Stainless Steel Container

 E: 1x Waterproof Drawstring Bag Pouch

Couple Combo: Kokoro Medium Food Warmer

INCLUDES:

 A: 2x Porcelain Bowl A (1100ml)

 B: 2x Porcelain Bowl B (550ml)

 C: 2x Porcelain Bowl C (300ml)

 D: 2x Kokoro Medium Stainless Steel Container

 E: 2x Waterproof Drawstring Bag Pouch

 F: 2x Porcelain Cutlery Set

 G: 4× Silicone Lid

 

Couple Combo: Kokoro Large Food Warmer

INCLUDES:

 A: 2x Porcelain Bowl A (1100ml)

 B: 2x Porcelain Bowl B (550ml)

 C: 4x Porcelain Bowl C (300ml)

 D: 2x Kokoro Large Stainless Steel Container

 E: 2x Waterproof Drawstring Bag Pouch

 F: 2x Porcelain Cutlery Set

 G: 6× Silicone Lid

 

Variant Combo: Kokoro Food Warmer

INCLUDES:

 A: 2x Porcelain Bowl A (1100ml)

 B: 2x Porcelain Bowl B (550ml)

 C: 3x Porcelain Bowl C (300ml)

 E: 2x Waterproof Drawstring Bag Pouch

 F: 2x Porcelain Cutlery Set

story:
About Bear Bagels

Bear Bagels was born at Easter in 2020, as Melbourne locked down and went into hibernation. 

Baker and chef Erik Koel had closed up shop at his Healesville cafe, Hominy Southern Kitchen, which was just a year old. Times were tough for hospitality venues, especially fledgling ones.

To keep busy, Erik began making hot cross buns out of our home kitchen to supply our friends' Mitcham cafe, The Mabel. 

Having spent years as a baker at Silo in Canberra, at Melbourne’s Rathdowne Street Food Store and at Healesville’s Innocent Bystander/Giant Steps, Erik found that returning to baking was like coming home.

He began making bagels and other baked treats, and delivering them to The Mabel and locally in Healesville.

As lockdown eased, markets started up again. Erik started baking through the night, then heading straight to a market, accompanied by our hardworking 13-year-old, Lu, to see everything snapped up in few hours. 

Our home kitchen couldn't keep up with demand.

It was time for a proper set-up. It was time for a fully equipped Bear Bagelry.

 

What We Need & What You Get

We’ve taken the lease on a Yarra Valley location and planned and costed the fit-out.  

In addition to our own investment, we'll need $35,000 to purchase bakery equipment and have the required plumbing and electrical work carried out. 

In return for your support, you will receive a Bear Bagels voucher and a shout-out on social media, along with our sincere gratitude. There’s also the option to choose an exclusive T-shirt featuring our Bear Bagels logo, designed by Sean Zachariah. 

PLUS the first 50 people to support the campaign and share it on social media using #bearbagels will receive an invitation to the Bear Bagels launch party, where you know the food will be GOOD. There’ll be bagels, there’ll be sweet treats, there’ll be so much more.


The Impact

We will need bagelry and delivery staff as soon as production hits its stride. We are also keen to take on a baking apprentice. The more successful this campaign is, the sooner we can add to our team and the more hours we'll be able to open the bagelry each week. 

Hominy Southern Kitchen employed two part-time staff as well as catering staff for functions. All staff members were local. We can't wait to employ locals again.

If the campaign goes super-well, we'll be able to buy the equipment we need to make baguettes and focaccia, a range of sourdough products, and speciality items such as shokupan (Japanese milk bread).

 

Risks & Challenges

Bear Bagels has gone from strength to strength, even through the challenges of Melbourne's lockdowns and travel restrictions. While the bagelry is being built, Erik will continue to produce from our home kitchen to ensure that the business remains stable (and those bagels keep coming!) 

Erik has worked in senior roles in two hospitality openings: Little Hugh cafe (where he was head chef) and Meletos (where he was sous chef). He has a wealth of experience planning and overseeing kitchen fit-outs and has worked as a consultant to other hospitality ventures, helping them plan their kitchens and menus. 

We have factored delays in securing electrical and plumbing work into our plans, because lockdowns are a certainty over the next couple of months. No matter what, we'll get the bagelry doors open in time for summer 2021–22.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Even if you can't contribute financially, it would mean the world to us if you could share our campaign in your networks. Indiegogo has share tools to make that as easy as possible.

We've been humbled by all the support we've received from friends, family and our Yarra Valley community over the past year. Thanks so much for reading our campaign. We can't wait to see you at the bagelry!

story:
Chocolates of Glenshiel needs your help to build a new home. Join us on our Highland adventure as we create a chocolate factory that Willy Wonka would be proud of!

 

Where We Started

In 2016 after finishing high school, Finlay followed his passion for artisanal chocolate and his love of his Highland home and founded Chocolates of Glenshiel. In the five years since, he’s managed to recruit a wee team of folk who share his passion and strong values.

At Chocolates of Glenshiel we set out to bring people a true taste of Scotland; our chocolates are inspired by our Highland home – the beautiful scenery and the everchanging seasons - and created using the finest Scottish ingredients. We strive to be a force for good in every aspect of business:

  • Our environmental impact is closely monitored and considered before any decisions are taken.
  • Our small Highland community is very important to us and we do everything we can to support and uplift it.
  • We bring people together through the medium of chocolate!

 

Where We Are Now

Since we began, we’ve been handcrafting our chocolates in a wee cabin in Ratagan, Glenshiel. This cabin has been so great to us – it’s offered us a chocolate production site as well as a small shop where we’ve been able to welcome one or two customers in at a time. Now, thanks to the amazing support of these customers, we’re in the blessed position of having vastly outgrown our cabin. We’re struggling to keep up with production demand and due to taking on new team members and expanding our office, we no longer have room for our shop or to have any customers in to experience our craft. It’s time to build a new home for Chocolates of Glenshiel.

So, we’re moving! We have secured new premises for our business just down the road from where we are now, at the foot of the Five Sisters of Kintail in the heart of Glenshiel. Somewhere with enough room for us all; somewhere we can really put our stamp on and call our own.

 

Where We’re Going

Our customers are at the heart of everything we do. We strongly believe that delicious, quality chocolate is for everyone and that everyone should be able to experience it fully. As we’re sure you already know, chocolate is one of the few universally adored foods and really does have the ability to bring people together – there’s nothing else quite like it! We want to be able to welcome our customers into our business; allow them to see, smell and fully understand our chocolate, not just taste it.

Now, we don’t want to brag, but we’ve got the chocolate bit down - that’s good to go. What we need is space and our new chocolate centre has space by the bucketload! We want to build a big (yet cosy) seating area with views into the chocolate kitchen on one side and out on to the Five Sisters of Kintail mountains on the other, with a private seating area for guided tastings; a café serving delicious, fresh, local produce; and a shop selling beautiful, unique Scottish goodies (we’re on the lookout for things to stock – shoot us a message on Facebook or Instagram if you have any suggestions!). That’s a big ask – we know – but we know we can do it.

Now, this is where you come in.

 

What We Need

We're hoping to raise £8,000. This will go towards creating our chocolate tasting experience, a window into the chocolate kitchen and making sure our seating area is the perfect, cosy spot to enjoy a cuppa, a chocolate and a blether. In exchange for your help we have lots of tasty treats and exciting experiences to offer you!

 

Where We’ll Do It

Glenshiel is located 65 miles west of Inverness, around 7 miles south of Eilean Donan Castle, 15 miles south of Kyle of Lochalsh and 17 miles south of the Skye Bridge. At the moment, Glenshiel is a place without much recognition. Despite the breath-taking views and world-class walking and climbing routes, there is not much tourism in the area – Glenshiel is a place driven through rather than to.

Our new premises is located right on the main road to the Skye Bridge which sees around 5,000 cars per day. Our chocolate centre will put Glenshiel on the map – the visitors are already here, they just need something to do!

 

Risks & Challenges

Tourism is always a risky business. Lochalsh and the surrounding area is very popular with tourists but there is no guarantee that these people will continue to travel here. Luckily, our business is well balanced between bringing people to Glenshiel, and bringing Glenshiel to people. Much of our revenue comes from our online sales so we are not solely reliant on in-store custom. Additionally, we supply some very lovely farm shops, gift shops and cafes with wholesale goods. Our new chocolate kitchen will give us increased production capacity, allowing us to boost wholesale sales. 

Secondly, we are very people-orientated and we know that hiring the right team is essential to any successful business. In order to hire the right people, the right people need to be available! Glenshiel - and much of the Highlands in general - has a lack of available workers and accommodation which may become an issue for us in the future. 

 

Other Ways You Can Help

We would so appreciate you sharing our story and getting the word out a bit! Please click the share button to post to your socials or send to a friend who might be interested.

story:
Meet KOKORO, the latest innovative porcelain thermal flask. This product is brought to you by us SWANZ. We are passionate in porcelain flasks and specialise in the market for over 10 years.

Swanz KOKORO

Sustainable Porcelain Thermal Flask. Stain and smell free, no more metallic taste. With interior made of replaceable 100% Fine Porcelain, keeping beverages hot or cold for over 8 hours.

This project has raised over S$500,000 in Taiwan alone. Currently we are on production phase and committed to deliver our products on schedule.

Read some of our previous backers review at the end of this page.

 

 

As Featured on:

 

But before that you might wonder, why KOKORO? 

Interior Made of 100% Solid Porcelain

One of the main key feature of Kokoro is that its interior made of 100% solid high grade porcelain with it's exterior made of 304 high grade stainless steel.

Suitable for All Kinds of Beverages

We are used to stainless steel thermal flasks in the market. But do you know that some beverages are not suitable to be placed in stainless steel flask?

Common issues stainless steel thermal flask users might face:

  1. Metallic Taste
  2. Change of smell or aroma of beverages
  3. Metal Leaching

 

Stainless steel thermal flask can leach chemical to acidic beverages, and will stain when used for long period of time. Iron, chromium and nickel were all found to leach into both alkaline and acidic foods and beverages such as coffee, tea, citrus juice, milk and many more.

However, with porcelain interior, Swanz Kokoro is 100% BPA Free and free from metal, chemical leachings. 

No More Metallic Taste and Lingering Smell

Say no more to metallic taste in your drinks. Porcelain preserves your beverages authentic taste. Enjoy the best of your drinks.

Naturally Easy to Clean

Porcelain are made from kaolin clay and fired at temperatures as high as 2,600°F. This makes porcelain pores extremely fine, making it easy to clean and prevents any stain and smell to linger on it.

 

Say goodbye to coffee stains

One of the popular question being asked: What is the main difference between porcelain and ceramic? The main difference is the size of surface pores. Ceramic has relatively larger pores compared to porcelain, resulting in stain might still occur in common ceramic. Which it will not happen in porcelain.

No Peeling Off

Another common question to be asked is what is the difference between solid porcelain and ceramic coating? Ceramic coatings is only a coating, it might peel off and having the risk of peel off residues to be consumed.

 

Swanz Kokoro interior made of 100% Solid Fine Porcelain. Not coating.

 

Table of Comparison

Replaceable Porcelain Interior

In addition of all, if something unfortunate happened and the porcelain is damaged, it is replaceable. Making KOKORO the most sustainable porcelain thermal flask.

GET 180 DAYS WARRANTY

Exclusive for Indiegogo Backers

*More details below

100% Chemical Free

With its solid porcelain interior, Kokoro is naturally chemical free. 100% BPA, chemical and metal leaching free. We don't just stop there, we elevated our manufacturing methods.

Common porcelain thermal flask assembled by using various chemical compound such as glue or chemical adhesive. Using our Japan patented unique construction design, Kokoro's assembly method is free from any chemical compounds. 

 

Common way to assemble porcelain vacuum flask :

 
Kokoro Assembly Method:
 
 
No additional chemical compound in assembly

Product Features

We pay attention to smallest details of Kokoro. Each of its feature designed to elevate your drinking experience.

 

Integrated Porcelain Strainer

All Swanz Kokoro flasks comes with an integrated whole porcelain tea strainer.

 

Smart Kokoro's porcelain tea strainer design allow users to drink tea without the mess. It is suitable to be used for loose tea as well. Tea lovers, this is a product you have been waiting for.

 

Easy to assemble
 
 
Suitable for all kinds of tea
 

Built-in Handle

Kokoro comes with a built-in handle. Making it easy to be carried and mobile. 

Strong durable material. Able to withstand for up to 5kg weight.

Leak Proof Silicone Cover

Another little detail we add to enhance our product is our easy clean silicone cover. Made of 100% baby safe silicone material. Able to withstand heat for up to 237°F / 113°C.
 
 
Easy to clean silicone cover
 
 
100% Leak Proof
 

Double Wall Insulation

Kokoro's exterior is made out of 304 high grade stainless steel with double wall insulation feature. It is able to keep your beverages hot for up to 8 hours and cold for up to 12 hours.

 
 
 
Keeping your beverages on your desirable temperature all day.

Add on Accessories: Silicone Lid

Replace the cap and turn Kokoro into a travelling mug. Able to be used with straw and drink on the go. Made of 100% baby safe heat resistant silicone.

3 Different Sizes

Kokoro comes in 3 convenient sizes, 450ml, 550ml, 680ml. Perfectly fits takeaway coffee for you coffee drinkers.

Colour Options

Kokoro comes in 5 pastel colours: Black, Pink, White, Blue and Purple.

Durable Exterior Finishing

We understand that your flask exterior should be durable. We made Kokoro's exterior to be extra durable with it's stone finishing.

 

Warranty for 180 Days

for Indiegogo Backers

Applicable if damaged within 180 days after receiving the product, for one time porcelain inner change.

 

How it Works?

 

Simply send the thermal flask with damaged porcelain to our nearest service centers (located in Singapore ,Taiwan, and China). Then we will change the porcelain and ship back to you.

Updates from Kokoro Team

 

 

 
This is Jerry, our project manager in Taiwan. In this video he personally shares about our Kokoro porcelain thermal flask and our development progress.

What Other Backers Said:

We compile some of our backers review on previous crowdfunding platforms. And here is what they got to say.

Click here for the Product Reviews of other Swanz Porcelain Flask:

https://bit.ly/2xFPb0U

Amazing news! Thanks to all our generous backers, we have reached our S$15,000 goal. As promised, we are unlocking new perks! Introducing our latest limited edition perks, Kokoro Print Collection. Available in 4 beautiful print series: Grey Marble, 3D Texture Pink Lace, 3D Texture Fantasie, and Blue Flora. Perks limited to only 10pcs per design. Grab fast while it last. Delivery by: August 2020.

Project Timeline

Swanz Kokoro currently under first production phase.

We are committed to work based on our promised schedule, and we guarantee that you will receive your SWANZ KOKORO. We had done stringent quality checks for Kokoro in all phases. After the first batch production, we are confident and committed in the quality assurance of Kokoro.

 

 
 
We run a thorough product quality check to maintain product consistency and high quality.
 
 


 
 

Patent and Certifications

SWANZ is operating under SCUBE GIFT PTE. LTD, based in Singapore. Our assembly technology had been successfully patented in Taiwan and China in 2020, and patent application in many other countries are currently on the progress. And our product has been vacuum insulated technology has been patented in Singapore since 2017.

Official website: https://www.swanzbrand.com
Contact email: enquiry@swanzbrand.com
